description.zh: 本課程的目標在提供有志從事教育工作的學生有關教育心理學的系統知識使其在未來從事教職時，具最有效的方法瞭解，敘述，預測及其學生的行為並從而採用最佳的教學方式，以達成教育目標。本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標： 1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。1-2具備領域/學科知識及相關教學知能。2-2具備善用教學策略進行有效教學之能力。2-3具備運用適切方法進行學習評量之能力。3-2具備掌握學生差異進行相關輔導之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: The object of this course is to introduce the systematic knowledge of educational psychology to the students who have the willingness to be teachers. It presents the students with the basic psychology theories of instructional process; mental-physical development; the principles of learning and instruction; the learning about motor and skill, words and concepts; cultivating of thinking and creative; motivation and interest in instructing process; the measurement of individual difference; proper instructions against differently mental students; teacher-student relationship and students behaviors; instruction evaluation; mental hygiene and health in school. After finishing this course, the persons will get the most effective methods to understand, describe or predict their students behaviors, and can choose the best instructional ways achieve the educational goal, when they become teachers in the future.

description.en: The course is aimed to provide practicing administrative, teaching and classroom management affairs at internship schools. In addition, the course is aimed to cultivate students to have educational professional ethics among the interactions with teachers and students of internship schools.

description.en: This course offers an introduction about vocational education and training as following (a) flexible adjustment the system of vocational education and training in Taiwan (b) emphasizing vocation education and training system; (c) establish solid theoretical foundation of the vocational education and training.

description.zh: 本課程著重點於奠定青少年發展理論的基礎、瞭解教育現場相關議題與案例及發展中學教育現場實作的能力。具體目標分列如下: （一） 瞭解青少年發展的相關理論。（二） 探討青少年行為發展的特性與困擾的來源。（三） 發展青少年問題行為的診斷與輔導策略。課程內容包括：青少年的定義與內涵、青少年發展的理論模式、青少年的生理發展與輔導、青少年的智能發展與輔導、青少年的社會化發展與輔導、青少年的情緒發展與輔導、青少年的人格發展與輔導、青少年的道德發展與輔導、青少年的生涯發展與輔導。 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標：1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。3-1具備發揮班級經營效能營造支持性學習環境之能力。3-2具備掌握學生差異進行相關輔導之能力。4-1具備善盡教育專業責任之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: The course aims to (1) understand the definition and essence of adolescence development, (2) understands the theory and application of adolescence development, (3) cultivate the fundamental capability of adolescence development and guidance. It covers the definition and essence of adolescence, theory of adolescence development and guidance, physiology development and guidance of adolescence, intelligence development and guidance of adolescence, socialization development and guidance of adolescence, emotion development and guidance of adolescence, personality development and guidance of adolescence, moral development and guidance of adolescence, and career development and guidance of adolescence.

description.zh: 著作權法係為保障著作人著作權益，調和社會公共利益，促進國家文化發展，所特別制定之法律。該法所稱著作包括：語文著作、音樂著作、戲劇、舞蹈著作、美術著作、攝影著作、圖形著作、視聽著作、錄音著作、建築著作、電腦程式著作等。著作權的保障內涵則包含因著作完成所生之著作人格權及著作財產權。本課程將兼顧實例與理論進行探討，來深化同學對於著作權的瞭解。
description.en: Copyright Act  is specifically enacted for the purposes of protecting the rights and interests of authors with respect to their works, balancing different interests for the common good of society, and promoting the development of national culture. "Works" of this act, include the following:1.Oral and literary works.2.Musical works.3.Dramatic and choreographic works.4.Artistic works.5.Photographic works.6.Pictorial and graphical works.7.Audiovisual works.8.Sound recordings.9.Architectural works.10.Computer programs. "Copyright" means the moral rights and economic rights subsisting in a completed work.　The discussion in the course covers theory and examples, to enhance a deeper understanding of Copyright for the students.

name.zh: 行政程序法與行政訴訟法

description.zh: 行政程序法係為使行政行為遵循公正、公開與民主之程序，確保依法行政之原則，以保障人民權益，提高行政效能，增進人民對行政之信賴所制定之法律，其為行政機關辦理行政行為之基本法。行政訴訟法則提供司法救濟程序，保障人民權益，確保國家行政權之合法行使。本課程兼顧理論與實例的探討，強化同學對於行政程序法與行政訴訟法的認識，並培養同學準備相關國家考試的基礎。
description.en: Administrative Procedure Act is enacted to ensure that all administrative acts are carried out in pursuance of a fair, open and democratic process based on the principle of administration by law so as to protect the rights and interest of the people, enhance administrative efficiency and further the people's reliance on administration. dministrative Litigation Act  offers   judicial remedies procedure to  ensure  rights  of  the  people .The discussion in the course covers theory and examples，to enhance a deeper understanding of Administrative Procedure Act and Administrative Litigation Act for the students and to equip them with a wider knowledge base for further national screening tests.

description.zh: 本課程將以智慧財產局頒布之「專利審查基準」為藍本，依「先程序後實體」原則先就「程序審查」部分介紹專利申請之程式，再就專利申請之「實體審查」部分依序說明專利說明書暨圖式之構成、可專利類型、產業利用性、新穎性、進步性等專利要件，先申請原則、發明單一性、優先權、說明書及圖式之修正、分割申請及改請申請，以及專利權期間延長案。
description.en: This course is to introduce the formality examination and the substantive examination based upon the "Patent Examination Guideline" issued by the TIPO, including the formality of the patent application, and the allowable subjects for patent, utility, novelty, inventive steps, first-to-file, priority claim, amendment, divisional application, and the extension of patent term and so on.

description.zh: 「民事訴訟法」第一個部分，此部分旨在向修課同學作民事訴訟法之概括介紹，而此一介紹包含下列三個重點： 一、民事訴訟法之立法背景 二、民事訴訟法之理論 三、民事訴訟法之解釋方法 參與此部分乃理解民事訴訟法之關鍵一步，修課同學將受益匪淺。第二個部分，此部分會聚焦在民事訴訟法之細節上，尤其是下列三個重點：一、對於民事訴訟法之進一步闡述二、民事訴訟法於案例事實之適用三、民法與民事訴訟法之結合於此部分課程結束時，修課同學應有能力依據民事訴訟法來處理常見之民事法律問題。
description.en: “Civil Procedure Law” the first part of this course, is aiming to give participants a general introduction to the Civil Procedure Law, and the introduction contains the following three points: 1. The legislative background of the Civil Procedure Law. 2. The theories of the Civil Procedure Law. 3. The interpretive methods of the Civil Procedure Law. Attending the part is the critical step to understanding the Civil Procedure Law and benefits participants a lot.The second part of this course, is focusing on the details of the Civil Proce-dure Law, especially the following three points: 1. Further elucidation of the Civil Procedure Law.2. Application of the Civil Procedure Law to the facts.3. Combination of the Civil Law and the Civil Procedure Law.At the end of the part, participants are supposed to be able to deal with common civil legal problems according to the Civil Procedure Law.

description.zh: 民法總則介紹民法中的共通概念與基本原則，為整部民法以及所有法律的學習基礎。透過民法總則之學習，同學可以熟悉法律的思考模式及規範架構。本課程將以理論與實務並重方式協助同學學習。
description.en: The General Principle of the Civil Law serves to introduce the common concept and fundamental principle of the Civil Law.  In short, the General Principle of the Civil Law predominates as a learning basis for the whole Civil Law and all legal study.  Through learning on the General Principle of the Civil Law, students can be familiar with the model of legal thought and the framework of norm.  This course aims to assist students learning from both theory and practice.

description.zh: 以講授刑法基本概念的犯罪論、罪數論及刑罰論為主軸；並輔以相關案例的檢討、分析，以使同學對於抽象的概念及學理，得以理解及適用。目的除在強化同學對維護個人、社會、國家等法益的體認外，亦在奠定學習刑法各論的基礎。
description.en: The course focuses on the introduction to the fundamental ideas of the criminal law such as the criminal theory, crime arithmetic and punishment theory. Many relevant cases are presented in the class for further discussion and analysis. The ultimate objective of the course is not only to enhance the students a deeper understanding of the rights granted to individuals, society and nations, but also to equip them with a wider knowledge base ready for a further studying on each specific section of the Criminal Law.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅選修(四)

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹精密機電系統之基本架構包括機械系統(如機架、基礎、導程與軸承、動力傳遞系統等)及控制系統(如製程控制、數值控制、幾何資料處理、進給驅動器、位置量測系統、機器監視與診斷等)，探討先進精密機電系統(如工具機、機器人、FMS、CIM、微機電系統等)。
description.en: This course will give an introduction to basic components of the precision mechatronic system including mechanical systems (e.g. machine frame, machine foundation, bearings and guides, power transmission etc.) and control systems (e.g. process control, numerical control, geometric data processing, driving systems, position measurement system, automatic manufacturing monitoring and diagnostics, etc. ). Studies of advanced precision mechatronic systems including machine tools, robotics, FMS, CIM , micro- electro- mechanical systems (MEMS) and so on.

description.zh: 本課程以提升學生英文能力，至全民英檢中級以上的程度為目標。教學內容以加強學生日常生活中，如：購物、旅遊、定餐等用語之溝通、運用、表達及閱讀寫作等能力為主。
description.en: The goal of this course is to help students enhance their English proficiency superior to the Intermediate Level of General English Proficiency Test. A student who completes this course will be able to perform routine daily communication such as travel, shopping, ordering a meal, etc. and will have better understanding in reading and writing.

notes: 碩士班畢業門檻,限碩班學生修

description.en: Introduction of CAD software package. Review of Numerical technique for CAD.2-D Graphics, 3-D Graphics, surface modeling, solid modeling. Design optimization, Integrated CAD systems and Animation project.

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅選修(五)

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。本課程讓學生熟悉機電系統之整合技術與設計(如機電介面之原理、機械系統、感測與致動之原理及其元件、自動控制技術等)。實務製作以分組方式實施，內容包括PC及DSP微處理器控制之倒單擺平衡系統、熱爐箱溫度控制、或自走機器人設計與控制等。
description.en: The course contains technology and design of mechatronic system. For example: interface principle, mechanical system design, sensor and actuator device, and automatic control, etc. Hands-on experiments are carried out by team work and may include PC-based and microprocessor-based control of inverted pendulum system, oven temperature control, or mobile robot design and control.

notes: 學號單數號: 三/567 學號偶數號:四/234 上課

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。半導體材料、二極體、電晶體的原理、邏輯IC、記憶體IC。如物理沈積(PVD)、化學沈積(CVD)、高溫處理、微影、蝕刻及其相關設備介紹、廠物、維修、管理及工安等。IC封裝及測試。
description.en: Introduction to semiconductor material, diode, transistor, logic IC and memory IC, etc. description of the operation principles technology and related facilities about semiconductor fabrication processes, such as Physical vapor deposition (PVD), chemical vapor deposition (CVD), doping , oxidation , heat process, lithography , and etching etc., discussion of utilities, maintenance, management and industrial safety in the factory. Discussion of IC packaging and testing.

description.zh: 配電系統規劃及自動化，負載特性，配電變壓器的應用，二次輸電線及配電站設計，一次系統的設計考慮，二次系統的設計考慮，電壓降落及電力損失計算，電容器在配電系統上的應用，配電系統電壓調整，配電系統負載潮流分析，配電系統故障分析。
description.en: Course Title:Industrial power distribution Labs.Description:To familiarize students with the techniques of analyzing,designing, operating, maintaining high and low voltage powerdistribution systems.

notes: 四電四甲乙合開，修課人數限80人

description.zh: 各種時域響應之電腦繪圖，矩陣各項特性分析與應用，根值軌跡圖，波德圖，奈奎士圖，PID控制器之設計，Lead-Lag補償器之設計，控制器時域及頻域分析，控制器在狀態空間之設計，實例探討，書報研讀。
description.en: Course Title:Automatic Control PracticeDescription:This course is first to introduce the basic concepts ofcontrol systems and the mathematical background, second, state thetransfer function, block diagram and signal  flow graph, third,discuss the mathematical modeling of control systems and elements, andforth, describe the time-domain analysis, root locus techniques andfrequency-domain of control systems, and then to measure the characterof control systems, Finally, the design of control system will beintroduced.

name.zh: 國際觀培養-越南文化與語言
name.en: Development of global perspective:Vietnam culture and language

description.zh: 在全球金融海嘯後，已開發國家經濟成長趨緩，新興亞洲國家-東協國家經濟成長迅速，本課程將以越南語教學為主，越南經貿、觀光文化及越語字母拼音教學，讓學生在學習越語的同時，深入了解越南文化，協助學生拓展東南亞的就業版圖。
description.en: This series of courses aim to provide students with opportunities to understand emerging markets in a global context. Global economy in the post-recession world relies heavily on emerging economies, in particular countries in Southeast Asia known as ASEAN. Seeing the greater potential for economic gains and development, we build up the courses from introducing the fundamentals, including but not limited to, their economy, culture, tourism and people with special emphasis on the use of the language for communication along with its relevance to Taiwan as a trading partner.

notes: 四電四與最後一哩合開

description.zh: 本課程目標為提升學生英文之閱讀能力與聽力。包含增加英文單字數量，科技論文文法、句型、結構等特質，及訓練聽力習慣。
description.en: This course aims to leverage up the ability of English reading and listening for students. It includes vocabulary amount increasing, grammar recognition, sentence style and organization, and listening comprehension.

description.en: Application of chemical engineering science techniques to design of chemical processes. Comprehensive problems are assigned which include heat, material and economic balances, unit operations and processes, kinetics and thermodynamics.The major responsibility is placed on individuals or small groups for the optimum design and selection of equipment, and for the calculations of required sizes, plant layout, and cost analyses.

description.en: By the use of flow rate control instrument, temperature control instrument, liquid level control instrument and pressure control instrument, students study the applicability of basic control theory.

description.en: Let students understand the basic process of ceramics manufacturing and the fundamental property of testing ceramics, including the physical, mechanical and electricity conductivity property of ceramics material. Except for matching the domestic industry development structure, this laboratory course shall introduce the new manufacturing technique concept of new ceramics.

description.zh: 本課程介紹電子顯微鏡之結構，成像及繞射原理，以及在材料科學方面之應用，課程內容包括穿透式電子顯微鏡之構造，電磁透鏡與成像原理，電子繞射原理，繞射圖型分析，試片之製作方法。掃描式電子顯微鏡之構造及成像原理。EDS及WDS之X光光譜測量。
description.en: The course introduces the structure of a electron microsope,the theories of forming image and diffraction, the applications of material science. The course contents include the transmission electron microscope structure,the electronic magnetic lens and image formation theory, electronic diffraction theory, diffraction diagram analysis, and the making of test sample, the structure and forming image principle of a scanning electron microscope, the X-ray spectrography of EDS and WDS.

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 此課程之目的為介紹一整體的鑽井與井完成作業，內容包括：油氣地質及岩石特性、油氣探勘方法、鑽機設備、鑽井技術、岩心取樣與分析、井測、岩層破碎、井壁處理及井完成作業。
description.en: English Description  Properties and occurrence of petroleum; petroleum exploration, equipment, materials, and processes employed in drilling and production practices; well completions; oil field operation.

description.zh: 本課程主旨在建立學生對預力構材的基本觀念。由對預力的認識、材料的要求，以主預力損失的瞭解及估算方式。從而由應力的觀點，討論撓曲斷面的分析及設計。最後再以施工及力學的須求方面探討預力鋼索佈置狀況。期使學生在修習後，能具備初步預力分析及設計之能力。
description.en: This course is aimed at establishing the basic concept of prestressed members to the students。It starts from introducing the high strength materials required by prestressed design，then the calculation of prestress losses are showns。The analysis and design of a flexural member are shown in a complete manner。

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹河川污染控制中有關河川污染源的種類及數量，就其分析模式中有關溶氧之來源、溶氧之消耗、非感潮河川與氧垂曲線模式之推演、河川調查及資料分析工作及河川涵容能力之計算方法亦有完整之敘說，藉由河川涵容能力之推估，達到控制或分配家庭污水及工業廢水之目的。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the River Pollution Control.

name.zh: 國際觀培養-馬來文化與語言
name.en: Emerging Market Series: Getting to know Malaysia

description.zh: 在全球金融海嘯後，已開發國家經濟成長趨緩，新興亞洲國家特別是東協五國經濟成長迅速，藉由傳授東南亞四小語以協助學生拓展東南亞的就業版圖並促進台灣與東南亞國家之間的經貿關係。本課程旨在培養學生的基本溝通能力，運用馬來語來與當地馬來母語者打招呼、了解馬來文化、建立人際關係、購物、敘述事物…等，以此來協助學生前往馬來西亞就業作為兩國的經濟橋樑。
description.en: In order to embrace economic development of globalization, especially in Asian and Southeast Asian countries, there is a need to introduce and equip our students not only with the basic local language but also to understand the local culture so as to strengthen the economic tie between Taiwan and the Asian countries and to enhance the employment opportunities of our students in these Asian countries.This course aims to help students to understand and develop basic communication skills by utilizing Bahasa Malaysia (Malaysian language) to communicate with Malaysian in terms of greeting, business contact establishment, interpersonal communication, etc. Historical and geographical backgrounds of Malaysia and their local cultures will also be introduced.

notes: 四土四與最後一哩合開

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅選修(四)

description.zh: 本課程之目的在培養學生論文尋找及期刊選讀之能力，每位學生必須針對專一之問題尋找最近相關的資料。問題的認定，由老師協助資料之準備及口頭報告等是學生不可少的。且一學期至少須報告2次。學期成績將以學生在課堂上參與的態度及兩份書面資料決定。
description.en: This course is aimed at providing a training of review and paper studies for 4th grade students. Students are requested to search for the latest papers for a specific topic. Presentation and discussion are required for all attendants, twice persemester. The final score for a student will be determined based on students interaction in the class and two written reports.

description.zh: 基因體學工程學，是結合分子生物技術及電腦資訊科技的新領域。由於分子生物技術的快速發展，DNA定序的資料也在近幾年中以驚人的速度產生；而這大量的資料經由電腦資訊的整理分析，所延伸出來的知識，已被廣泛地運用在生物醫學上的研究。基因體學工程學，是現代生物科技必要的知識。
description.en: Genomic engineering is a newly developed field joining the knowledge from molecular biology and computational technology. Molecular biology techniques in high speed screening such as DNA sequencing have generated large amount of data.  From these data, new frontier in biomedical researches can be explored. Genomic engineering is one of the essential discipline of biotechnology。

description.zh: 講述色彩、表色系統、測色、色彩容許度、色差、色彩管理和電腦配色之基本概念，以及介紹染色顏料的種類以及顏料粒子、結構與其色澤牢度之關係。
description.en: Description of the basic concept of color, color-order system, color measurement, color tolerance, color difference, color control and computer for color matching. On the other hand, It introduces all kinds of pigments available in the market currently and its relationship between the particle size and chemical structure with the properties and colour of pigments.

description.en: 1.Introduction to Computer Network2.Layered Structure3.Routing and Switching 4.Flow and Congestion Control5.Medium Access Control 6.Local Area Network Protocols and Standards7.Network Interconnection8.Performance Analysis

notes: 四子三四甲乙合開，限45人

description.zh: 本課程在研習類比積體電路設計，其課程目的在給予學習者了解目前類比CMOS積體電路分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1.類比設計概述2.基本MOS元件物理特性3.單級放大器4.差動放大器5.頻率響應6.雜訊分析7.回授8.運算放大器9.振盪器10.鎖相迴路
description.en: This course is concerned with the analog integrated circuit design. Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of analog CMOS integrated circuits, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1.Introduction o analog design2.Basic MOS device physics3.Single-stage amplifiers4.Differential amplifiers5.Frequency response6.Noise7.Feedback8.Operational amplifiers9.Oscillators10.Phase-locked loops

notes: 綜502   四子三四甲乙合開，限45人

description.en: 1. P-N Junctions2. P-N Junctions Diode3. Junction Field-Effect Transistor4. Metal-Semiconductor FET5. Metal-Oxide-Semiconductor FET (MOSFET)6. Bipolar Transistor

notes: 四子三四甲乙合開，限45人

description.zh: 1.基本CMOS邏輯閘設計，2.CMOS基本邏輯閘時序模擬，3.CMOS基本邏輯閘佈局，4.數位電路功能分析與模擬，5.階層式的電路組成，6.中小型電路設計，7.VHDL系統，8.認識Cadence系統，9.圖形編輯設備的操作練習，10.零件庫介紹，11.設計電路之輸入編輯，12.電路模擬實習，13.數位電路的晶片設計，14. 電路自動化設計15.晶片製造專題。

Electronic Design Automation 13.Special projects.

notes: 綜306   四子三四甲乙合開，限24人

description.en: This course introduces the concepts, theories, and approaches of facilities planning.  Material handling and site selection are also included.

name.zh: 創新思維執行力實務應用
name.en: Practices and applications of TRIZ innovative thinking

description.zh: 在現今產業激烈競爭與利潤微薄之階段，落實執行"突破創新"以增加競爭力之唯一生存之道，但鮮少有企業真正瞭解與實際地徹底執行它。不僅工程或服務技術要創新，管理思維更要突破創新，以有效迅速解?錯綜複雜的研發、工程與管理之諸多矛盾問題。本課程以創新構思問題解?法(TRIZ)為基礎，詳細介紹工程技術如何落實創新與管理實務創新如何執行。本課程適用於自有品牌業者、ODM或OEM製造業者、服務業者與學術單位教學研究，特點如下:完整詳實闡述TRIZ理論並輔以大量簡單案例說明TRIZ概念、工程TRIZ實務案例10餘個與TRIZ工程與管理之參數與創新原則說明簡例約800餘個，管理實務案例20餘個，包含研發管理、服務業管理、專案管理與生產管理等。案例與簡例最多，創新執行力可快速上手與實施應用。本課程TRIZ研發、工程與管理兼顧，製造業與服務業高層、中層與基層員工皆符合讀者條件，使"突破創新"輕易實務執行並成為企業文化，亦適用於大學與研究所之工管、企管(經營管理)、工商管與工程相關科系，可自行按需求選擇性深入教授講解某些章節，也替產業界事先磨練一群創新思維之活力新血，可長久伴隨您在職場(或未來進入職場)解決研發、工程與管理之困難矛盾問題。
description.en: The aim of this course is to show how to implement TRIZ to resolve conflicts in Product R&D, engineering, and management tactic in a innovative thinking manner. TRIZ has been well-known as a creative and innovative thinking theory in solving engineering and technology contradictions in the last two decades. However, few studies and practical usage were proposed in Product R&D, management area. Nearly 30 real cases are discussed to demonstrate the ideas guided by TRIZ in product R&D management, engineering technology, Project management, Service industry management, and Production management. This course is able to pre-train a lot of students creative way and solve contradiction for further applications in real career.

notes: 工管四、碩士班與最後一哩合開

description.zh: 資料和決策課程主要在介紹資訊和資料工程學，電腦推論的應用和企業決策管理等內容的設計的決策支援系統、資料抽離、資料採礦和智慧型的使用者－系統的合作系?。並利用電腦的使用來發現資料的型態，及其他任何類型的本文、影像或數字。其目的為幫助企業經理在不確定之情況下，瞭解資料和決策分析，作出較好的決定。
description.en: Data and Decision course focuses on information and data engineering, computational reasoning applied, and enterprise decision management to the design of decision support systems, information extraction, data mining, and intelligent, adaptive user-system collaboration. It implements the use of computers to discover patterns in data, of any kind, text, images or numbers.To develop an understanding of data and decision analysis to help managers make better decisions in the presence of uncertainty.

notes: 工管四與最後一哩合開

description.zh: 介紹設施規劃，合理化的觀念、原理、方法步驟，舊規劃合理化的理由、重要性、方法及步驟。設施搬運系統及位置的遴選、及其考慮因素及決定方法
description.en: This course introduces the concepts, theories, and approaches of facilities planning.  Material handling and site selection are also included.

description.zh: 本課程介紹環境之物理及人因相關因素對人員生理及肌肉骨骼系統之影響。內容包括噪音與噪音防治、氣溫等大氣狀況、振動與加速度、環境照明、人體計測與工作/工作空間設計等相關內容。課程目的在使修課學生了解工業環境與作業負荷對於人員之影響，進而於職場建立有效之因應對策。使學生能夠a. 瞭解工作場所主要人因工程危害因子(包括採光照明、噪音振動、極端溫濕環境、異常氣壓等物理因子及肌肉骨骼危害因子)、法規要求、量測/計算方法、評估與控制策略、以及相對應的預防措施。b. 具有評估及分析工業環境物理性與肌肉骨骼危害因子及擬訂其控制及預防對策的能力。
description.en: This course introduces physical and musculoskeletal effects of various environmental and ergonomic factors on humans. Lectures cover topics of noise and noise control, environmental temperature, vibration and acceleration measurements, environmental illumination, and work design. This course aims to cultivate students to identify different types of ergonomic risk factors (e.g. luminance, extreme temperatures, abnormal pressure, noise, vibration, musculoskeletal hazards) that can present in the work environment and to learn the related regulation requirements, risk assessment tools, and hazard control strategies.

notes: 甲乙合開(上課一週)【停開】

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅選修(二)

description.zh: 以專題設計方式，訓練學生獨立企劃、分析、評斷、組織、歸納與創新之思考，並實際演練完整之設計過程。學生經由分組或獨自完成一設計主題。上學期課程以題目界定、資料收集、分析調查、結論定義、構想發展及草模提交等為教學內容，下學期則進行細部設計、模型製作、專刊編輯、展示佈置以及設計報告提交等為教學內容,以培養專業設計之能力。
description.en: Studio in product design for the senior. Students are expected to exhibit a full range of professional competence and facility in designing advanced products and component complexes of broad scope. All phases of each project design are brought to a professional level under supervision of the director. This course puts emphasis on presentation techniques, including verbal, visual, and written. A project report is required.

description.zh: 1. 藉其他專業知識的融入訓練學生具備深化建築實質環境的能力，兼顧實質設計手法與內涵。2. 訓練學生具備探討和發展設計議題，培養設計思考和評斷能力，並透過設計報告的撰寫，指導學生獨力發展與組織設計過程的能力。
description.en: With a specific design issue, in this course we explore the students' sensibility to our built environment. Students exercise a complete design process of a real project in two semesters, that they may touch more contexts in design thinking and practice more skills in architectural design.

description.zh: 本課主要以實例演練、訓練學生對施工圖樣、施工規範及施工實務之瞭解，並熟練數量計算及單價分析之方法及要點。主要授課內容含蓋：1.講授各項工程施工規範之標準、2.以實例訓練各項工程數量計算及單價分析：a.假設工程 b.安全措施工程 c.土方工程 d.混凝土工程 e.模板工程 f.鋼筋工程 g.磚牆工程 h.粉刷及裝修工程 i.雜項工程。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is training students to comprehend the working drawings, the performance standards and the affairs of works by drilling actual example. This course makes students to be familiar with not only calculating the quantity but also the essentials and the methods in analyzing the unite price. The lesson's contents include: A.	To teach the standards of every performance standard. B.	To train calculating and analyzing the unite price of every work.1.	Temporary work 2.	Safety measure work 3.	Earthwork4.	Concrete work5.	Mold work6.	Reinforcement work7.	Partition work8.	Plaster, decoration and finish work9.	Miscellaneous work

description.zh: 本課程採用分組教學，以1：5的師生比例就教師之專長指導學生在建築實務工作之各領域進行資料搜集，現場觀摩，對特定之課題提出報告，訓練學生深入的接觸並膫解實際的工作，以培養學生發掘問題，解決問題之執業能力。課程中間之暑假學生必須至事務所或工地現場實習，成果列為成績之一部分。
description.en: There are teaching groups for this course, each teacher by his particular research field direct five students in special topics on Architecture practice for information collecting, site studying, and report writing, The purpose is training students to come into conduct with reality Architecture working. Then, footer students professional ability to find problems, and resolve there problems in working field.On summer vocation period, students who take this course should do practice teaching in Architecture in Architecture office or working site, and the student performance for practice teaching will reueal to final grade.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意自動控制概論，汽車自動變速簡介，液動基本原理，液體接合扭力變換器，行星齒輪與超速控制，自動閥控系統與換檔裝置，液壓油與液壓油之冷卻，電動自動變速簡介，各式變速箱舉例。
description.en: Introduction to Automatic Control, Introduction to AutomobileTransmission, Hydraulic Principle, Hydraulic Coupling, Planetary Gears, Automatic Transmission Valve System, Hydraulic Oil Cooling System, Introduction to Electrical Transmission System.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。包括液滲檢測法、磁粉檢測法、放射線、超音波檢測法、中子射線、全像攝影檢測法等、針對各種檢測方法之原理、可靠度、靈敏度等作探討。
description.en: Liquid-Penetrant Examination, Magnetic Particle Examination, Radiographic Examination, Ultrasonic Examination, and other less common techniques. Physical Bases of Tests, Materials to which applicable, Calibration Standards, Reliability.

description.zh: 介紹台灣軌道車輛現況及未來、軌道車輛名詞、轉向架與懸吊系統、軌道與設施、車輛動態、輪軌界面、推進傳動與制動、行控號誌、大眾捷運系統、輕軌電車、高速鐵路、軌道公司參訪。
description.en: This course is a basic course of railroad vehicle system.  Topics will be mentioned: railroad vehicles in Taiwan, terminology, bogie and suspension systems, rail and construction, vehicle dynamics, wheel and rail, drive / transmission and brake, train control and communication, mass rapid transit system, light rail transit system, high speed rail transit system, and tours in railway company..

description.zh: 先修課程:4402014或負責教授同意空調的基本原理，冷凍的基本循環原理：冷煤及管路、壓縮機冷凝器、膨脹閥等熱負荷之計算，冷、暖氣循環系統之負荷平衡計算，冷凍空調之控制系統介紹與計算，冷凍空調之電路系統介紹與計算。
description.en: Fundamentals: Tables of Thermodynamic Properties, Principles of Heat Transfer Classification of Refrigeration, Vapor Compression Refrigeration System, Compressors, Condensers, Evaporators, Expansion Values, Refrigerants, Piping and Accessories, Load Calculations, Control.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意．肇事之形成因素，重建之定義及過程，數學物理及動力學應用於肇事重建，了解車輛碰撞行為，肇事之理解認知及反應，肇事之動量功能原理應用．車速估算．及轉向過度修正，轎車．機車．行人．及卡車肇事重建．
description.en: Causes & Contributing Factor in traffic accident, Process of Traffic Accidetn Reconstruction, Apply Math. Physics and Dynamics in Traffic Accident Reconstruction., Understanding Vehicle Collision Behavior, Perception & Reaction in Traffic Accident, Principle of Momnetum、 Work and Energy、 Speed Estimates for Vehicle, Steering Over-correction in Traffic Accident, Vehicle-Pedestrian, Motorcycle and Heavy Truck Traffic Accident Reconstruction。

description.zh: 本門課內容包括以下﹕能量與動力原理，燃料與燃燒簡介，鍋爐與熱交換器簡介，渦輪機與內燃機，核能與水力發電動力廠
description.en: This course is an introduction to the following topics﹔principles of energy and power, fuels and combustion, boiler and heat exchanger, turbine and internal combustion systems, nuclear and hydraulic power plants.

description.zh: 本課程著重冷凍系統和空調系統能源的分析，探討構成系統的主要元件－壓縮機、蒸發器和冷凝器的耗能，和各泵、冰水盤管、空調箱及風／水管路系統的能源耗損，進而對整個系統運轉時的效率予以檢討。最後提出各種改善方法，節約能源和減少電力契約容量的技術，以使學生具有節能省電的正確理論觀念和實務技術。
description.en: This lesson is focused on the energy analyses of refrigeration systems and air-conditioning systems. The operating defects of compressors, evaporators andcondensers are to be investigated. Also the energy consumption's of pumps, fan coils air-handling units and duct/water systems are studied. The over all performance of the entire system is thus discussed. Several methods to improve the shortages and the techniques to energy conservation and electricity demand cut-down will be proposed.The students should understand correctly the theory of energy conservation and thetechnology to improve the systems.

description.zh: 本課程著重分析中英文之句型, 語法, 慣用語等表達方式及比較其異同之處,並以密集練習及詳細解說交替, 使學生在兩種語言思考間運用自如。
description.en: This course focuses on the presentation of basic syntax, common expression, sentence structure, and an analytical comparison between the methodologies of English and Chinese translation, accompanied with frequent writing practice on students' part.

description.zh: 本課程旨在強化學生口語表達及溝通能力，開拓知識領域以及培養學生的國際觀。由逐步短句，段落至長途步口譯，循序漸進。從入門訣竅如讀稿技巧，筆記要領密集訓練及模擬演練。範圍涵蓋經貿，金融，時事，科技，產業等。
description.en: This course aims to strengthen students' oral expression and communicative abilities in English, broaden knowledge and international views. The course is designed to train the students gradually by using the techniques of Consecutive Interpretation, which starts from short sentences and paragraphs and leads to longer passages. For example, the techniques in sight translation, note-taking and various simulation drills are intensely practiced in class. It ranges from commercial & trade, banking affairs, current events, technologies and production.

description.zh: 引導學生瞭解如何根據不同對象、不同場合、不同時間、不同情境，貼切地使用英語，也概括介紹分析語言溝通所需的概念與工具。
description.en: This course is concerned with how speakers organize what they want to say in accordance with who they are talking to, where, when, and under what circumstances. It offers a broad overview of the concepts and tools that are required for analyzing how linguistic communication works.

description.zh: 研讀戲劇作品，注重作品所反映的人文與社會環境的互動。上課方式以評析和討論為主，以加強口語表達能力及文學賞析能力，並以戲劇演練提升語言學習效果。
description.en: This course is intended to acquaint students with western plays which focus on the interaction between culture and society.  In addition to developing students' speaking ability through discussion, particular attention is given to the appreciation of literature.  Students are encouraged to perform some of the plays to enhance their proficiency in language and their interest in literature.

description.zh: 探討印刷媒體（報紙、雜誌）、放映性媒體與電子媒體（Facebook、Blog）之特性，及英文在各類媒體應用之道；培養學生科技、商業、及教學媒體之賞析與應用能力。
description.en: This course is designed to help explore some of the important properties of the media: printing press , projective and electronic as well as the applied approaches of English in diverse media. The ability to enjoy and apply various types of media, including those on technology, business or teaching is among the course objectives.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅選修(一)

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅選修(四)

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解策略管理的意義及其演進, 如何建立公司策略以增加之競爭力。課程主要內容包括：1.策略管理的意義, 2.企業內外在環境分析, 3.策略制定, 4.策略執行與評估, 5.事業階層策略, 6.公司策略, 7.購併。
description.en: The objective of the course is to establish a set of frameworks for the formulation and implementation of strategy. Topics of the course include SWOT, strategy formulation, strategy implementation, business-level strategy, corporate-level strategy, and merger & acquisition.

description.zh: 幫助同學了解投資的理論與實務發展,訓練分析能力與培養正確投資觀念：投資學基礎、固定收益證券、權益證券、投資組合分析與管理、衍生性金融商品與風險管理
description.en: To introduce the developments of investment theories and practice to the students and try to enhance their analysis ability. ＊concepts of investment＊fixed-income securities＊equity securities＊portfolio theory and analysis＊financial derivatives and risk management

description.zh: 本課程之要旨在於建構產業分析之思維架構及洞悉市場預測擴展之研究能力。課程中引用各種研究方法及預測手法並以個案探討方式配合。
description.en: The objective of this course is to construct the infrastructure of industry analysis and to build up the research capability. By introducing the methodologies and forecasting tools, the case study is implied in this class.

description.zh: 本課程包含：國際經濟環境，文化與政治差異，國際行銷組織，行銷組合決策，及國際行銷資訊系統。
description.en: This course focuses on three major areas: 1.The environment of global markets and cross-cultural comparison.2.Assessment of global market opportunities and threats.3.Development and implementation of global marketing strategies.

description.zh: 由於休閒產業與生活息息相關，期予學生能充分瞭解休業，將來就業或是對未來休閒生活都會有很大幫助。課程內包括：1.休閒產業簡介、2.休閒的經營系統、3.休閒的型式與活動、4.休閒的顧客服務。
description.en: Because the recreation industry correlation about the life, hope students will understand recreation and have much helpfulness to purse an occupation or life of recreation. The course include:1.The introduction of recreation industry.2.The working system of recreation.3.The play and style of recreation.4.The customer service of recreation.

description.zh: 本課程從全球化觀念來探討品牌在公司經營中所應扮演的策略性角色，課程中以全新研究的品牌理論來探討全球品牌的重要關鍵議題，其中包括全球品牌與公司策略的關係與整合、整合品牌概念、新經濟時代的品牌觀念與全球營運模式、整合品牌的執行與評估。
description.en: This program is designed to help students learn about and apply the concepts and practices of global branding as they are used in a wide variety of settings in product and service firms, consumer and business markets, profits and non-profit organizations, domestic and global companies, and small and large business. Global Branding Management builds on Global branding Strategy, focusing on the major tactics and tools used by international marketers in managing their global marketing plans.

description.zh: 本課程目標旨在介紹學生軟體工程的概念，並瞭解相關的技術與應用。學生將會學習，開發一個高品質軟體所需要的軟體工程原理、觀念、方法、技術、與步驟。本課程將介紹下列主題：專案流程、專案管理與規劃、.系統需求分析、系統設計方法、系統測試與驗證、系統維護方法等。
description.en: This course aims to provide students with a better knowledge and skills in software engineering. In particular, students will learn about the principles, concepts, methods, and techniques of the software engineering approach to producing quality software. The course covers the subjects on software process models, project management and planning, software requirement specifications and analysis models, software design methods, software verification and validation techniques, and software maintenance.

description.zh: 1.數位視訊的表示法 2.畫面內編碼 3.JPEC與JPEG2000 4.動作補償與畫面間編碼 5.視訊傳輸之漸進式編碼與強健性 6.合成影像之編碼 7.多媒體資料索引與檢索8.智慧財產權的保護：浮水印與其他９. MPEG標準
description.en: 1.Representations of Digital Video 2.Intraframe Coding 3.JPEG and JPEG 2000Standards 4.Motion Compensation and Interframe Coding 5.Content-BasedScalability and Robustness of Video Transmission 6.Coding of Synthetic Video 7.Multimedia Indexing and Retrieval 8.IP Protection Techniques:watermarking and others 9.MPEG Standards

notes: 四資四、資工所、電資外生專班合開

description.zh: 本課程包含機率與隨機程序的基礎原理,如機率量測,隨機變數,大數法則,隨機程序,穩態隨機程序及其特性。本門課程為研究所在通訊及控制組之基本課程。
description.en: This course contains the basic theories in probability and random processes. It includes probability measures, random variables, the law of large numberrandom processes and stationary processes. The course is a basic course in field of communications and controls in graduate school.

notes: 四資四、資工所、電資外生專班合開

description.zh: 智慧型代理人系統技術結合人工智慧、分散式計算與網際網路技術，逐漸成為未來重要的資訊技術。本課程介紹智慧型代理人系統之理論、架構與應用。學生透過此課程實做一個智慧型代理人系統，以瞭解代理人技術與應用。課程主要內容包括 - 1.多代理人理論與架構，2. 機器學習與代理人調適，3. 協調技術，4. 合作與競爭，5.賽局理論與決策，6.知識本體論， 7.網路服務。本課程包含機率與隨機程序的基礎原理,如機率量測,隨機變數,大數法則,隨機程序,穩態隨機程序及其特性。本門課程為研究所在通訊及控制組之基本課程。
description.en: Intelligent agents integrate artificial intelligence, network, distributed computing and web technology. This course introduces the state of the art of intelligent agents, its theories, languages, architectures and applications. Students can learn from the course the basic concepts and understanding of agent system through the course. The content includes the intelligent agents about - 1.Fundamental theories and architectures, 2. Machine learning and adaptive agents, 3.Negotiation and coordination, 4 Cooperative and competitive problem solving, 5. Game theories and decision making, 6. Ontology and knowledge sharing, 7.Semantic web and web services.

description.zh: 探討PN接面之特性，短通道效應，表通道技術原理，費米能階等基本元件物理，及0.25-0.18微米以下需明瞭元件物理知識。
description.en: Basic physics of semiconductor device, sub-half micre CMOS device,characteristics of P/N junction, short channel effect, surface channel N/P device, Fermi-level etc. The relative hpysical knowledge of 0.25 um device is discussed as well.

notes: 億光1035,擬抵研究所不列大學畢業學分者,請選研究所課

description.zh: 1.簡介 2.視覺與色彩 3.陰極射線管顯示器 4.電漿顯示器 5.液晶顯示器 6.電致發光顯示器 7.場發射顯示器 8.有機發光顯示器
description.en: 1.Introduction 2.Sight and color 3.Cathode-ray tube(CRT) 4.Plasma panel display(PDP) 5.Liquid crystal display(LCD) 6.Electrolumisence display(ELP) 7.Field emission display(FED) 8.Organic light emitting device(OLED)

notes: 億光1035,擬抵研究所不列大學畢業學分者,請選研究所課

description.zh: 1. 太陽能電池工作原理，2. 半導體材料與模型，3. 理想轉換效率，4. 單晶矽太陽能電池，5. 薄膜太陽能電池，6. 太空與聚光太陽能電池，7. 有機與敏染太陽能電池。
description.en: 1 Principles of Solar Cells Operation, 2. Semiconductor Material and Modeling, 3. Ideal Conversion Efficiency, 4. Crystalline Silicon Solar Cels, 5. Thin Film Solar Cell Technology, 6. Space and Concentrator Cells, 7. Organic and Dye Sensitised Cells.

description.zh: 以工業設計的工作領域為範圍，藉由個案討論方式使學生熟練設計管理中有關方針之形成、計劃、聯繫、監督、評價、形象策略與控制、再教育、人事管理及合約等技術,設計的組織雖與決策，設計過程之管理，設計政策與產品策略之訂定，溝通技巧及設計之法律問題。。
description.en: This courses contents identifies specific topic areas: Nature of Design Work and its management, Quality by Design, Design in a Business Context, Legal Aspects of Design, Design Policy Making.

notes: 四設四與四創意四合開(產品組)

description.zh: 待修正；本課程主要在講解一般都市計畫的主要內容，同時針對台灣現行都市計畫的有關組織體系、實務作業與現況問題作有系統的探討。授課主題涵蓋：1.台灣空間規劃的階層體系、2.都市計畫組織體系與功能、3.台灣都市計畫的發展沿革、4.都市規劃的程序、內容與方法、5.規劃資料的搜集、調查與分析、6.土地使用計畫、7.交通計畫、8.公共設施計畫、9.都市更新、10.都市計畫未來的發展趨勢、11.實際案例分析、研討。

notes: 四建四與四創意四合開(建築)

description.zh: 1.建築法規體系概述、2.中央法規標準法、3.建築法架構解說、4.建築師法及營造業管理規則、5.省市建築管理規則、6.省市畸零地使用規則、7.面臨現有巷道申請建築原則、8.都市計劃法系簡介及鄉關法規介紹、9.建築技術規則及台北市土地使用分區管制規則、10. 研定(修)中之建築法規介紹。
description.en: 1.	Introduction to the Building Law and Regulation System2.	Building Code3.	Construction Code4.	Urban planning Code5.	Zoning Code6.	Analysis on New Directions of the Codes

notes: 四建四與四創意四合開(建築)

description.zh: 以專題研究方式訓練學生獨立企劃,分析,評斷,歸納及創新思考的能力.並藉由對生活型態,生活行為,生活需求,家具與室內空間相關性等問題之深入探討,實際演練設計之過程及熟練家具與室內設計之手法.
description.en: Studio in product design for the senior. Students are expected to exhibit a full range of professional competence and facility in designing advanced products and component complexes of broad scope. All phases of each project design are brought to a professional level under supervision of the director. This course puts emphasis on presentation techniques, including verbal, visual, and written. A project report is required.

name.zh: 文化創意開發與創業管理

description.zh: N
description.en: N

description.zh: 藝術與新意的遇合，一切就從分享開始! 不論黑白彩色、平面立體、抽象具象、靜態動感，藝術一向變化多端，不論抒發情感、宣揚宗教、服務政治或是傳達思想，藝術從來不缺理由，別說你不懂藝術!因為在二十一世紀裡，藝術已不僅是貴婦們的權力，身為未來設計師與建築師的您們，應該積極讓藝術存在於你生活的週遭，不論分享美感經驗、探討觀點流派、解析藝術風格、從事文化創意設計，亦或是批判現今藝術社群，你都擁有發聲的權力。而此系列講座中的十場演講，都是在不同藝術領域中，從事創作多年的佼佼者，透過大師講座的平台，讓大師們進入校園，與全校師生一同分享這藝術與新意的無限饗宴。
description.en: When art meets innovation, everything starts from sharing! No matter art is black or white, flat or three-dimensional, abstract or concrete, motionless or active, it has always been protean. When art is used to express feelings, advocate religions, propagandizing politics, or transmitting thoughts, it never needs any reason. Don't say that you don't know what art is! In the 21st century, art is no longer the privilege of wealthy ladies. But you all, the future designers and architects, should work harder to make yourself inseparable with art. When you are sharing your own experience about esthetics, exploring different art sects, analyzing art styles, engaging in cultural creative design, or criticizing the contemporary art sects, you have the right to speak up. The ten speeches in this series will be delivered by many experts from different fields. It would be our honor to have them in the campus and share their fruition of art with all of the staff and students.

description.zh: 本課程旨在以專題設計方式，訓練學生確認並建立需求、發展設計選擇方案、製作設計的互動形式、設計評估的專業知能，並以設計專案方式演練完整之設計過程。學生經由分組合作或獨自創作完成一媒體設計主題。上學期課程以題目釐定、資料蒐集、分析調查、設計定義、構想發展、程式設計、雛型製作等活動為教學內容；下學期則進行觀察測試、使用性評估、程式調校、專刊編輯、展示佈置以及設計報告提交等為教學內容，以培養學生具備互動設計專題製作之專業知能。
description.en: Through project design, the course prepares students to confirm the needs of design, develop alternatives of media design projects, create interactive modes, and evaluate design performance through independent study or cooperative learning. In the first semester, learning materials of the course include subject clarification, data collection, analysis and investigation, design definition, concept development, programming, and prototyping. In the second semester, learning materials of the course include observation and testing, usability evaluation, programming debug, report editing, exhibition and design report submission. Accordingly, students will be ready for professional competencies of interaction design projects.

description.zh: 本課程旨在以專題設計方式，訓練學生確認並建立需求、發展設計選擇方案、製作設計的互動形式、設計評估的專業知能，並以設計專案方式演練完整之設計過程。學生經由分組合作或獨自創作完成一視覺傳達設計主題。上學期課程以題目釐定、資料蒐集、分析調查、設計定義、構想發展、程式設計、雛型製作等活動為教學內容；下學期則進行觀察測試、使用性評估、程式調校、專刊編輯、展示佈置以及設計報告提交等為教學內容，以培養學生具備互動設計專題製作之專業知能。
description.en: Through project design, the course prepares students to confirm the needs of design, develop alternatives of visual communication design projects, create interactive modes, and evaluate design performance through independent study or cooperative learning. In the first semester, learning materials of the course include subject clarification, data collection, analysis and investigation, design definition, concept development, programming, and prototyping. In the second semester, learning materials of the course include observation and testing, usability evaluation, programming debug, report editing, exhibition and design report submission. Accordingly, students will be ready for professional competencies of interaction design projects.

description.zh: 本課程重點在培養學生設計並製作個人作品集的能力，作品媒材及形式包含平面、立體、裝置、錄像的製作及集體討論，並配合藝術教學，探討「藝術家∕作品∕觀眾」或「作者∕文本∕讀者」 之間的關係。修習本課程的學生必須完成一本收錄個人歷年作品之作品集。
description.en: This course is intended to help students develop their portfolio design; media of the portfolio includes 2D, 3D, installation, and video. To achieve this goal, students in this course are required to submit portfolio. In addition, they will discuss the relation between artist/ art/ audience or author/ text/ reader.

description.zh: 基於學生畢業後的生涯發展，本課程目標旨在提供學生清楚認知未來的生涯發展，進而規劃自己的進路。針對設計學生畢業後的發展可以從學術界與實務界兩方面考量，學術界以直升研究所或工作後再修讀在職專班，而實務界則以可從事的相關職場做介紹與分析各行業的特色與前途，可擔任的職務名稱包括：互動設計師、互動程式設計師、使用者介面設計師、互動廣告企劃等，以供學生參考。
description.en: Based on the personal career development,  the course aims to provide a clearly scope and knowledge of future career development. This career can be analyzed in two categories, one is academic field that provide the master program and in-job training program; the another is practical field which concerns about more related design job, such as interaction designer, interactive programmer, user interface designer and interactive advertisement planner. This course not only introduces the design-related job, but also analyzes their characteristics and future development route.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.

description.zh: 本課程利用三學年四學期的時間，培養學生簡易法文的聽、說、讀、寫能力，以達到溝通的目的，增進學生對法國文化的認識與興趣，提供學生法文的基礎知識（包括字母、讀音、語法等）。授課內容：1.個人（姓名、數字、身體重要部位、職業、年齡等），2.家庭（親屬稱謂、住宅式樣、個性、求學、介紹他人等），3.日常生活對話（打電話、道謝、道歉、討論天氣、討論日常活動、常用物品、約會、重要場所、用餐、提出邀請等）。
description.en: This is a French language course for beginners. By keeping their interests in study French, students are expected to have basic communicational skill, basic knowledge of French language (including alphabet, phonetic and grammar) and better understand French culture. This course contains: 1. Personal expression (names, numbers, body, occupation, age etc.) 2.Family (relatives, house, personality, studying, introduction etc.) 3.daily conversation (give a phone call, thanks, apologize, discussion about weather, Activities, dating, dining, invitation etc.)

description.zh: 中文課程共分四年三階段授課。 第一年以華語教學為主，授課重點為：（一）華語基本句型句法；（二）華語基本會話；（三）生活語言；（四）標音系統。 第二、第三年，除延續第一年華語授課重點外，以段落朗讀和基本認字為主要訓練，並給與中國文字書寫訓練。 第四年，加強會話能力，認字與閱讀能力，並傳授中國文化。
description.en: The course of Chinese is categorized as three individual stages for four years. In the first year, the course focuses on : (a) Basic Sentence Patterns, (b) Basic Conversation, (c) Languages in the Real Life and (d) the phonetic system for the Chinese language. In the second and the third year, the training focuses on paragraph reading and term/character recognition-in addition to the teaching themes set in the first year. Writing courses are also added during this stage. In the fourth year, we add more emphasis on the conversational ability, term/character recognition and reading ability. More culture-related information will be included.

description.zh: 本課程主要包括礦業資金操作，礦業計畫管理，礦業經濟，現金流及成本分析。
description.en: Course contents include: financial aspects of mining, mineral project management, mine economics, risk analysis and cash flow and cost evaluation.

description.zh: 炸藥與爆破工程應用於岩石爆破，為採礦及大地工程的基本作業。本課程之目的在介紹炸藥性質、炸藥反應原理、爆材特性及應用、爆破設計及施工並兼及爆破作業之環境控制。
description.en: The blasting engineering course focuses on the introduction of explosives and their properties and characteristics, explosives and blasting theories, drilling and blasting design and operations, and environemtnal control of blasting.

description.zh: 介紹防止環境污染相關之防止技術。依氣體、液體、固體、噪音、輻射等各種不同污染源﹐分別探討解決空氣、水質、土壤、噪音以及熱污染之防治方法。內容包括環境工程有關之單元操作及設計﹐並對生物反應氣之組合、操作及用途加以介紹。進而達到環境保護之目的。
description.en: Junior standing.Introduction to environmental engineering as applied to water guality,water quality modeling and water and wastewater treatment.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅選修(三)

description.zh: 先修課程：3002012或負責教授同意。介紹各種不同方法分析(如能量法及Castigliano定理)、破壞理論、材料選用、可靠度概念、軸及軸承、離合器及煞車器、傳動元件(如皮帶、鏈條、齒輪)、軸聯接器、飛輪、彈簧等以及實例分析。
description.en: Introduction to Analysis Methods(Energy method & Castigliano theorem ), Failure Theory, Material Selection, Introduction to reliability, Shafts and Bearings, Clutches and Brakes, Power Transmission Elements (Belts, Chains and Gears), Couplings, Flywheels, Springs and analysis of expansions.

description.zh: (A)熱工實驗：能量轉換、熱之傳遞、對流及輻射、熱交換器、燃燒及燃料等之實驗。(B) 流力實驗：雷諾數實驗、管路摩擦實驗(損失係數)、管路能量損失實驗(90°彎管、小半徑彎管、大半徑彎管、突擴、突縮)、文氏管流量實驗、孔口板流量實驗、壓力量測實驗、堰流量實驗、pump性能曲線實驗、壓力中心實驗、風洞實驗(升力、阻力係數)。
description.en: (A) Thermal Lab.Thermal experiments include energy transformation, heat conduction, convection, and radiation, heat exchanger, combustion, etc. (B) Fluid Mechanics Lab.Reynolds’s Number test, Pipe friction test (loss coefficient), Pipe energy loss test (90°miter, elbow, sudden enlargement and contraction), Venturi meter flow measurement, Orifice flow measurement, Pressure measurement, Wear flow measurement, Pump performance test, Pressure center test, Wind tunnel experiments (lift and drag coefficient).

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。自動控制數學基礎、物理系統的數學模式、控制器的種類、時域分析、穩定性分析、根軌跡法、頻率領域的分析、控制系統的設計、Z 轉換、數位控制、電腦控制之介面及程式、現代控制理論與簡介。實習項目：MATLAB介紹與應用、暫態響應、PID 控制的影響、Lead-Lag控制的影響、頻率響應、系統判別、控制器設計。
description.en: Mathematical Foundation of Automatic Control, Mathematical Model of Physical System, Controller Type, Time-Domain Analysis, Stability Analysis, Root Locus Method, Frequency-Domain Analysis, Design of Control System, Z-Transform, Digital Control, Interface and Programmingof Computer Control, Theory and Introduction of Modern Control. Lab:Introduction and Application of MATLAB, Transient Response, Effect of PID Control, Effect of Lead-Lag Control, Frequency Response, System Identification, and Controller Design.

description.zh: CAD套裝軟體介紹、CAD數值技巧、二維畫圖、三維畫圖、曲面模型、實體模型建立、動畫之製作、最佳化設計、整合性之CAD系統及專題。
description.en: Introduction of CAD software package. Review of Numerical technique for CAD.2-D Graphics, 3-D Graphics, surface modeling, solid modeling. Design optimization, Integrated CAD systems and Animation project.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹產品製造的程序和各種加工方法，及使用的機械設備、製造過程材料及製程參數的影響，製程規劃及製造成本的因素、產品檢驗量測技術及品質管制的方法、製程自動化及電腦整合製造系統等。
description.en: Introduction to a variety of manufacturing processes and associated production equipments, operations planning and cost estimating of the production process, techniques of measurements and basic components of a quality control  system, concepts of process automation and computer integrated manufacturing.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002013或負責教授同意。簡易連桿組之合成（圖解法與解析法）、耦曲線在設計上之應用、同耦曲線族、機構之靜力與動力分析、轉子之平衡、機構之平衡、飛輪設計、引擎動力學與平衡、凸輪動力學、臨界轉速、球面與空間連桿組之簡介。
description.en: Synthesis of Four-bar linkage (Graphical and Analytical Method) , Application of Coupler careers in Design , coupler cognate Mechanisms static and dynamic analysis of Mechanisms. Balancing Rotating Masses, Flywheels, Balancing Reciprocating Masses, dynamics of Cams, critical Whirling speeds, Introduction of spherical and spatial linkages.

description.zh: 本課程介紹基本的金屬切削原理及其實務應用。本課程包含以下各項主題：(1)工具機與加工操作，(2)基本切削力學，(3)金屬切削溫度，(4)刀具壽命與刀具材料，(5)切削液與切削表面粗度，(6)金屬切削操作經濟學，(7)切屑控制，(8)研磨加工，(9)金屬切削實驗方法，(10)CAD/CAM與數控加工，(11)精密切削技術等。
description.en: This course is an introduction to basic metal-cutting principles and their practical applications. This course includes the following topics: (1) machine tools and machining operations, (2) fundamental metal-cutting mechanics, (3) temperature effect in metal machining, (4) tool lifetime and tool materials, (5) cutting coolants and surface roughness, (6) economics of meta-cutting operations, (7) chip control, (8) grinding, (9) experimental methods on metal machining, (10) CAD/CAM and numerical control (NC) machining, (11) techniques for precision machining.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。以C語言為主的計算機應用程式設計，得包含：人機界面程式、即時多工程式、輸出入界面程式、多媒體程式、通訊及網路程式。
description.en: Computer programming using C language: programming of human-machine interface, real-time multi-task programming, input/output interface programming, multimedia programming, communicational and network programming.

Lab:Introduction and Application of MATLAB, Transient Response, Effect of PID Control, Effect of Lead-Lag Control, Frequency Response, System Identification, and Controller Design.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。  數位系統簡介，數字系統及編碼，基本邏輯操作，數位積體電路設計，布氏代數與卡諾圖，組合電路設計與應用，正反器，暫存器，順序電路設計與應用，計數器與計時器，多工器與解多工器，記憶體，微處理機架構簡介。
description.en: Introduction to Digital Circuits, Digital Systems and Coding, Basic Logic Operations,  Boolean Algebra and K-Map, Combinational Logic Circuits, Flip-Flop, Register, Sequential Circuit Design and Applications, Counter  and Timer, Multiplexer and Demultiplexer, Shit Register and Memory, Introduction to Micro-processor.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅選修(五)

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹運轉中的機械系統其各部零件在運動必須遵守的準則及力在零件間的傳遞。範例含連桿組、凸輪、齒輪、純滾動系統、鏈輪、皮帶、滾筒式傳動組等的介紹。
description.en: Prerequisite: Consent of InstructorIntroduction of the principles that all the members of a mechanical system have to obey in motion as well as the forces transmitted between the members. Examples include linkages, cams, gears, pure rolling systems, chain drives, belt drives, friction drives, etc.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。物質熱力學特性、改變能量形式之基本原理、熱力學第一及第二定律、可逆性與可用性、動力循環、冷凍循環、混合氣、化學反應。
description.en: Prerequisite: Consent of InstructorThermodynamic Properties of Substance, Energy Forms, The First Law Thermodynamics, The Second Law of Thermodynamics, Irreversibility & Availability, Power Cycle, Refrigeration Systems, Mixtures, and Chemical Reactions.

description.zh: 先修課程：物理或負責教授同意。不可壓縮流體、質量不滅、非黏性流體之運動、柏努力定律、線性及角動量定理及其應用、渦流與勢流、黏性流、納維爾－史脫克斯方程式及應用、管中壓力頭損失及增加、邊界層與分離升力與阻力及雷諾方程式之應用。
description.en: Incompressible fluid, mass conservation, invoiced flow, Bernoulli principle, linear, angular momentum conservation and application, vortex, and potential flow, Navier-Stoke equation, pressure loss, boundary layer flow, separation flow, lift and drag, Reynold analogy and applications.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。(A)材料試驗：學習金相試片的準備及光學顯微鏡之觀察、材料顯微結構的認識、各種機械性質的試驗。(B)固力實驗：(1)一般性實驗：樑的撓度試驗、圓桿扭轉實驗；(2)振動實驗：質量－阻尼－彈簧系統實驗(MCK)、樑之共振頻率實驗、軸之臨界轉速實驗；(3)應力分析實驗：應變計實驗、光彈性實驗；(4)動態量測實驗：機械振動性質測定實驗、動平衡實驗、工具機切削力測定實驗。
description.en: (A) Materials testing: metallographic test, optical microscopes, microscopic structure, and mechanical property. (B) Solid mechanics testing: (1) testing of deflection of beams, testing of a twisted circular shaft; (2) testing of vibration : mass-damping spring system, testing of resonance frequency, testing of critical speed on shaft. (3) testing of stress analysis : strain gage, photo-elasticity  (4) testing of dynamic measurement, the property of mechanical vibration dynamic balance, and cutting resistance on machine tool.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。自動控制數學基礎、物理系統的數學模式、控制器的種類、時域分析、穩定性分析、根軌跡法、頻率領域的分析、控制系統的設計、Z 轉換、數位控制、電腦控制之介面及程式、現代控制理論與簡介。
description.en: Mathematical Foundation of Automatic Control, Mathematical Model of Physical System, Controller Type, Time-Domain Analysis, Stability Analysis, Root Locus Method, Frequency-Domain Analysis, Design of Control System, Z-Transform, Digital Control, Interface and Programming of Computer Control, Theory and Introduction of Modern Control.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。導論（含系統概論、資料表示法）、微電腦結構－中央處理單元、組合語言－指令型定址法、模組化程式、位元組和字串處裡、I/O 程式、DOS 功能常式、多元程式規劃、系統匯流排結構、I/O 介面、半導體記憶、多元處裡器組態。
description.en: Introduction (Overview of Microprocessor System, Data Representation), Microprocessor Architecture-CPU etc., Assembler Language-Instruction Format, Addressing Modes, Modular Programming, Byte and String Manipulation, I/O Programming, DOS Function Multiprogramming, SystemBus Structure, I/O Interface, Semiconductor Memory, Multiprocessor Configurations.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹產品製造的程序和各種加工方法，及使用的機械設備、製造過程材料及製程參數的影響，製程規劃及製造成本的因素、產品檢驗量測技術及品質管制的方法、製程自動化及電腦整合製造系統等。
description.en: Introduction to a variety of manufacturing processes and associated production equipments, operations planning and cost estimating of the production process, techniques of measurements and basic components of a quality control system, concepts of process automation and computer integrated manufacturing.

description.zh: 本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解信號與系統之基本概念及分析方法，以作為控制，通訊，電子電路，濾波器設計及數位信號處理等課程修習之基礎。課程內容包含：(1)標準訊號及訊號表示法 (2)連續系統的數學分析 (3)離散系統的數學分析 (4)拉氏轉換分析 (5)Z-轉換分析 (6)傅立葉分析 (7)工程應用。
description.en: course title : signals and systemsdescription : this course contains the properties of signals , systems , LTI systems , and basis linear transforms . this is a basic course in the field of control and communication .

Course Title:MicroprocessorDescription:This course introduces the working principles of computer.It puts emphasis on both hardware and software, as well as both theoryand appplication. Basically, this course covers the introduction ofgeneral microprocessors:their architecture and operation, Assemblylanguage program and module program, instruction addressing mode,instruction operation, and I/O Program and interface. Morespecifically, multi-programming configuration and multi-processingconfiguration are also discussed here. New topics will be added ifneeded.

description.zh: 通論，基本理論，傳輸線參數，傳輸線的數學模式，變壓器的數學模式及標么值系統，對稱成分，對稱三相故障，非對稱故障，負載潮流分析與控制，電力系統之經濟運轉，發電機之數學模式，電力系統穩定度，電壓控制系統，電力控制系統，系統保護。
description.en: Introduction, Basic principles, Transmission line parameters, Line model, power flow analysis, optimal dispatch of generation

description.zh: 探討各種電機特性及工作原理，內容包含：(1)磁路分析(2)電機-機械能量轉換 (3)繞組及氣隙磁動勢 (4)繞組電感及電壓方程式 (5)繞組因數 (6)直流機 (7)感應機 (8)同步機。
description.en: Course Title:Electric MachineryDescription:Principles, Construction and Application of transformer,DC motors, DC generators, induction motors, induction generators,synchronous motors and synchronous generators.

notes: 甲、丙班合開，修課人數限50人

description.zh: 最佳化組合邏輯之演算法，可規劃邏輯元件，組合邏輯之VLSI設計，使用MSI與標準電路元件設計多層邏輯，使用閘陣列設計，循序邏輯之元件，循序邏輯之分析與合成，VLSI之設計與測試技巧，各種CALD軟體工具介紹。
description.en: 1.Algorithms for Optimization of combirational logic2.VLSI realizations of combination logic3.Multilevel logic using complex parts and cells.4.Components of sequential systems5.Synthesis of clock-mode sequential circuits.

description.zh: (1)作業系統簡介 (2)工作觀念之介紹：異步及平行程式處理(3)記憶體管理：實際及虛擬記憶體之管理 (4)處理機管理：工作排序及多元處理 (5)輔助儲存體之管理：磁碟排序，檔案及資料庫 (6)網路作業系統及安全性(含分散式資料處理)(7)範例研究：DOS，UNIX Windows NT。
description.en: 1.History and evolution 2.Process concepts3.ASynchronous concurrent processes4.Desdlock and indefinite postponrmrnt5.Real storage management6.Virtual storage organization and management 7.Processor scheduling 8.Disk mansgement9.Network and security

notes: 四電三合開，計網電腦教室，限60人

description.zh: 半導體開關在電力電子電路之作用，波形失真與諧波分析,DC-DC轉換器，AC-DC轉換器，DC-AC轉換器。
description.en: 1.power semiconductor switches. 2.waveform distortion  & harmonic analysis. 3.DC-DC converter. 4.AC-DC converter. 5.DC-AC converter.

description.zh: 簡介，二極體電路，雙極性電晶體電路，低頻小信號放大器，場效電晶體電路，功率放大器，回授放大器，差動放大器，多級放大器，運算放大器，頻率響應分析與設計，振盪器及濾波器分析與設計，固態半導體理論。
description.en: Course Title:Linear ElectronicsDescription:This course is to study the characteristics of thesemiconductor devices and design of the electronic circuits.

notes: 四電三合開，修課人數限80人

description.zh: (1)向量分析 (2)靜電場理論：庫倫，高斯定律，電位能，電場能量與功，介電質電場現象，電容 (3)拉普拉斯方程式，電像法、邊界值問題 (4)靜磁場理論：畢沙瓦特，安培定律，磁位能，磁場能量與功，強磁性材料特性電感 (5)電磁感應與馬克斯威爾方程式。
description.en: Course Title:ElectromagnetismDescription:This is an introductory course of electromagnetic bias onits Engineering applications. The course is divided into five parts(1) the static electric field, (2) the steady electric current, (3)the static magnetic field, (4) the quari-stationary electromagneticfield and, (5) Maxwell equations and their applications.Besides, the course also introduces some of the optical technology.

notes: 四電三甲乙合開，修課人數限80人

description.zh: 本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解信號與系統之基本概念及分析方法，以作為控制，通訊，電子電路，濾波器設計及數位信號處理等課程修習之基礎。課程內容包含：(1)標準訊號及訊號表示法 (2)連續系統的數學分析 (3)離散系統的數學分析 (4)拉氏轉換分析 (5)Z-轉換分析 (6)傅立葉分析 (7)工程應用。
description.en: course title : signals and systemsdescription : this course contains the properties of signals , systems , LTI systems , and basis linear transforms . this is a basic course in the field of control and communication .

Course Title:MicroprocessorDescription:This course introduces the working principles of computer.It puts emphasis on both hardware and software, as well as both theoryand appplication. Basically, this course covers the introduction ofgeneral microprocessors:their architecture and operation, Assemblylanguage program and module program, instruction addressing mode,instruction operation, and I/O Program and interface. Morespecifically, multi-programming configuration and multi-processingconfiguration are also discussed here. New topics will be added ifneeded.

description.zh: 通論，基本理論，傳輸線參數，傳輸線的數學模式，變壓器的數學模式及標么值系統，對稱成分，對稱三相故障，非對稱故障，負載潮流分析與控制，電力系統之經濟運轉，發電機之數學模式，電力系統穩定度，電壓控制系統，電力控制系統，系統保護。
description.en: Introduction, Basic principles, Transmission line parameters, Line model, power flow analysis, optimal dispatch of generation

description.zh: 探討各種電機特性及工作原理，內容包含：(1)磁路分析(2)電機-機械能量轉換 (3)繞組及氣隙磁動勢 (4)繞組電感及電壓方程式 (5)繞組因數 (6)直流機 (7)感應機 (8)同步機。
description.en: Course Title:Electric MachineryDescription:Principles, Construction and Application of transformer,DC motors, DC generators, induction motors, induction generators,synchronous motors and synchronous generators.

notes: 甲、丙班合開，修課人數限30人

description.zh: 最佳化組合邏輯之演算法，可規劃邏輯元件，組合邏輯之VLSI設計，使用MSI與標準電路元件設計多層邏輯，使用閘陣列設計，循序邏輯之元件，循序邏輯之分析與合成，VLSI之設計與測試技巧，各種CALD軟體工具介紹。
description.en: 1.Algorithms for Optimization of combirational logic2.VLSI realizations of combination logic3.Multilevel logic using complex parts and cells.4.Components of sequential systems5.Synthesis of clock-mode sequential circuits.

description.zh: 半導體開關在電力電子電路之作用，波形失真與諧波分析,DC-DC轉換器，AC-DC轉換器，DC-AC轉換器。
description.en: 1.power semiconductor switches. 2.waveform distortion  & harmonic analysis. 3.DC-DC converter. 4.AC-DC converter. 5.DC-AC converter.

description.zh: (1)向量分析 (2)靜電場理論：庫倫，高斯定律，電位能，電場能量與功，介電質電場現象，電容 (3)拉普拉斯方程式，電像法、邊界值問題 (4)靜磁場理論：畢沙瓦特，安培定律，磁位能，磁場能量與功，強磁性材料特性電感 (5)電磁感應與馬克斯威爾方程式。
description.en: Course Title:ElectromagnetismDescription:This is an introductory course of electromagnetic bias onits Engineering applications. The course is divided into five parts(1) the static electric field, (2) the steady electric current, (3)the static magnetic field, (4) the quari-stationary electromagneticfield and, (5) Maxwell equations and their applications.Besides, the course also introduces some of the optical technology.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程之內容包括:化學動力學及反應機構之基本理論,動力學數據之處理,各式理想反應器之設計,非理想狀態反應器之討論,單獨觸媒中非均勻相反應器之討論.
description.en: The subjects of the course include 1) fundamental theories of chemical kinetics and reaction mechanisms, 2) kinetic data collection and manipulation, 3) design equations for ideal reactors, 4) discussions on nonideal reactors, and 5) nonhomogeneous catalytic reactions.

description.zh: 本課程介紹利用質量、能量守恆定律(熱力學第一定律)及均衡方程式(熱力學第二定律)，並在導入逸壓（Fugacity）觀念下，討論單成份系相平衡問題。最後延伸至多成份系統的熱力學性質的探討。此外還介紹化工程序中真實流體流動熱力學、機械能均衡、熱力學機械之設計與作功原理、熱機循環之熱力函數及熱機效率。
description.en: This course is designed as an introductory course in thermodynamics of chemical engineering.  Topics include the first and second law of thermodynamics, open and closed system, thermodynamics properties of materials, generalied correlations with real fluids and multicomponent systems.  Emphasis is placed on the chemical potential and its use in phase equilibria and chemical reaction equilibria.

name.zh: 單元操作與輸送現象(二)

description.zh: 本課程內容包括熱量傳送操作及其應用。
description.en: This course contents heat transfer and its application.

description.zh: 本課程屬於生物技術的基礎課程，授課內容強調基本生化原理，介紹細胞組成份〈包括核酸、蛋白質、醣類和脂質〉的化學、生物活性及代謝，並分別闡明代謝作用與基因表現的調節機轉，輔以現今生化尖端學術研究的介紹，希望能以一學期的緊密課程，讓學生瞭解現代生化科技領域的輪廓，作為日後深造或從事生化科技行業的奠基。
description.en: A one-term introductory biochemistry course that covers the biochemistry of the living state; the chemistry of amino acids, proteins, nucleic acids, carbohydrates, lipids, and steroids; energy transformations and chemical reactions in living cells; action of hormones; and self-regulation and self-replication of living organisms.

description.zh: 應用單元操作的原理與知識，使學生從實際操作中瞭解各種單元操 作設備的操作及性能。
description.en: The course provides facilities for students to apply theoretical and fundamental knowledge of unit operations. In such an environment, much emphasis is placed upon the operation and performance of various experimental units.

description.zh: 介紹各種精密化學分析儀器之原理及應用﹐學習組成結構之 鑑定、物種之分離及分析之工作方法。
description.en: Instruments are the tools for gathering qualitative and quantitative information about the composition and structure of matter, students must develop an understanding of these tools and how they are used to solve analytical problems.

description.zh: 以科學方法探討聚合物特性，使學生了解分子結構與物性的關係、物性之測定方法及物性與加工應用上之關係。
description.en: The unique features of polymers are introduced.  Specialemphasis is given to the structuring effects of processingon polymer morphology and properties.

name.zh: 藥用及化妝用高分子材料

description.zh: 本課程在教授學生藥用及化妝用高分子材料之相關產業製程及配方技術的實務知識，課程設計將首先介紹高分子材料的基本合成方法、物理化學性能、界面活性劑、乳化膠體及生物分解安全性。並教授高分子材料之應用區分為兩大類：其一是指在製藥之劑型加工時所用的和為改善藥物傳輸性能而採用的輔助材料(Excipients)，例如稀釋劑、潤滑劑、黏合劑、崩解劑、助流劑、緩和劑、穩定劑、保濕劑、膜包衣及膠囊殼等。藥用及化妝用輔助材料本身並不具有藥理作用，只是在藥品及化妝品的製造和使用中起從屬或輔助的作用。另一類高分子藥物則不同於前一類，它依靠連接在聚合物分子鏈上的藥理活性基團或高分子本身的藥理作用，進入人體後，能與機體組織發生生理反應，從而產生醫療美容或預防性效果。
description.en: The course is to provide the core knowledge for the development of pharmaceutical and cosmetic technology. It aims to educate and train students with the fundamental principles and applications of biodegradable polymers, surfactants, colloids, emulsions and their related physico-chemical properties. Then potential prospects of pharmaceutical and cosmetic polymers will be taught in two parts to help students understand the future frontiers in polymer science and technology. The first part of lectures will cover the wide range of polymer excipients such as diluents, lubricants, binders, disintegrants, glidants, demulcents, stabilizers, humercants, coatings, and capsules etc, which are inactive pharmaceutical ingredients used for assisting drug delivery. The second part will focus on polymer drugs, which are active pharmaceutical ingredients conjugated to polymer matrices such as polymeric micelles, liposomes, colloidosomes, and solid phase nanoparticle

description.zh: 使學生瞭解塑性變形對材料機械性質物理性質化學性質之影響，實習內容如下： 1. 鋼鐵、非鐵材料在各種加工度下之機械性質變化實驗。 2.不銹鋼料（18-8不銹鋼）在各種加工度下之耐蝕性比較實驗。 3. 線材之抽拉實驗，各種潤滑劑對抽拉力之影響。 4. 加工硬化對退火處理之組織變化，結晶粒大小之影響。 5. 塑性試驗模（plastic thinmold）操作及在壓軋加工下之變形模擬實驗。 6. 鍛造加工實驗。7. 板材之引伸加工實驗。
description.en: It makes students understand how plastic deformation influence mechanical , physical and chemical properties, the course content includes the following items: 1.The mechanical property change under all kinds of work degree for steel, iron and non-ferrous metal. 2.The comparative anti-corrosion test under all kinds of work degree for stainless steel(18-8 stainless steel) 3.The tension test of metal material, and how lubricator influences drawing force. 4.How work hardening influence tissue change at the tempering treatment, and how it influences crystal grain size. 5.The deformation simulation test under plastic thinmold operation and rolling & pressing processing. 6.Forging processing text. 7.The tensile processing test of plates.

description.zh: 材料科學為工程教育的重要科技，材料的性質與特性，為現代工程設計中佔有相當重要的地位，金屬材料的各種性質，都基於其內部構造的變化，其內部原子聚集成規則的結晶構造，亦或聚集成非結晶構造，其所形成的各種物理特性，由最基本的結晶構造開始了解。電子顯微鏡，破壞力學，超導性，電傳導，超塑性，動態回復，動態時效應變。差排理論、結晶核的形成與成長，合金相理論，晶界自由度，鑄造物的成核與均質化，硬化現象，固體擴散現象，破壞現象及理論，潛變的形成與原因等，充分了解金屬材料特性上的理論基礎與變化軌跡。
description.en: Properties and characteristics of materials play important role in modern engineering design.Each property of materials is based on its transformation at inner structure,its atoms inside converge either a regulated crystal structure or a noncrystal structure,their physical property should be understood from the most fundamental crystallinestructure, such as electronic microscope, destructive dynamics, super-conductivity,electronic conductivity, super-plasticity, dynamic recovery, dynamic aging strain, dislocation theory, the formation and growth of crystalline nucleus, alloy phasetheory, crystal boundary free degree, nucleus and homogenization of casting product,hardening phenomenon, solid diffusion phenomenon, destructive phenomenon andtheory, creep formation and its reason, all of these make student fully understandthe theory basis and change record of the metallic material characteristics.

description.zh: 本課程以訓練學生對陶瓷材料性質認識，並進而介紹陶瓷材料基本製程。課程重點在陶瓷粉体製備成形方法，燒結及燒結理論，除加強學生認識傳統陶瓷外，並對結構陶瓷與電子陶瓷之應用，作有系統的介紹。
description.en: This course aims at training the knowledge of ceramics materials and to introducethe basic manufacturing process of ceramics materials.The focus of this course isthe formation method of ceramics powder, sintering and sintering theory. Exceptfor strengthening the perception of traditonal ceramics, it also has a systematicintroduction to the application of structural ceramics and electronic ceramics..

description.zh: 本課程討論結晶質固體之基本概念，含晶體之幾何學及數學理論，並進一步討論結晶化學及結晶構造之原理，同時輔以電子顯微鏡法及X-射線法作結晶構造分析。
description.en: This course is to introduce Elements of Crystallography.

description.zh: 塑性加工係藉塑性變形將金屬材料變化成目的形狀之金屬加工法。本課程包含：金屬塑性變形之基礎，塑性力學之基礎及各種塑性加工法之介紹，最近之塑性加工技術的進步，並涉及與塑性加工關連之成形技術及適合各種塑性加工材料之選擇。
description.en: Plastic deformation processing is a metal processing method which based on plastic deformation to transform metal material into objective shape. This course includes the foundation of metal plastic deformation, the foundation of plastic dynamics, and the introduction of all kinds of plastic deformative processing methods. The recent technology development of plastic deformation processing is related to formation technique and suitable for alternatives to all kinds of plastic deformation materials.

description.zh: 資源處理的主要對象為礦物，但其他有些固體與固體間或固體與液體間之分離與純化也包括在本工程之內，採用的方法：凡是各分離物間不同之物理及化學性質，皆可設法加以利用。本課程則針對其應用方法加以介紹，以期學生對資源處理有一初步及完整的認識。授課內容包括：粉粒體之簡介、篩及篩分、碎礦機之種類及應用、磨礦機之種類及應用、分級及分級機、重液選礦、浮游選礦、磁選機之種類及應用等。
description.en: Mineral processing uses various techniques to perform solid-solid and soild-liguid separation and concentration by using physical and chemical properties between different minerals.  The separation and concentration methods include particle size analysis, screening, crushing, grinding, pulverizing, classification, heavy medium separation, flotation, magnetic separation, etc.

description.zh: 本課程針對各種資源之特性，使學生瞭解開發各類資源之方法及各種機器之應用。其內容包括：資源探勘、資源蘊藏量評估、資源開拓、資源開採、地下開採、地面開採、大型機器之應用及特殊工程施工。實習課程包括礦產品經濟分析、礦床蘊藏量計算、採礦方法評選、炸藥之化學成份設計、剝土比及露天開採界限之計算、露天開採爆破設計、邊坡穩定設計、物料 搬運機械選擇、物料搬運機械之成本分析、現場實習、捲揚系統設計、回收率之計算、排水設計、鑽進機械之選擇及成本估算、地下開採爆破設計、通風設計、開採 成本及利用之計算等。
description.en: Various mining exploitation methods and mining equipment involved are introduced in this class. It includes exploration, reserve calculation, resource exploitation, and mining operations (underground and surface). The laboratory exercises include mineral economic analysis, reserve evaluation, mining method selection, break-even analysis, surface blasting design, material handling and machines, hoisting design, recovery calculation, mine power and drainage and overall mining cost analysis.

description.zh: 探討有關無機物質的化學性質、原子結構及化學反應。討論在材料及礦物上之應用。
description.en: Chemical properties, atomic structure and chemical reactions of inorganic chemicals will be discussed. Their applications to material science and minerals will be discussed too.

description.zh: 本課程包括：1.陶瓷製程介紹，包括粉體製造、成形法、添加劑及燒結實務。2.材料基本概念，如陶瓷晶體結構、擴散、缺陷化學、固態反應等。3.結構陶瓷特性及檢測方法。4.電子陶瓷特性，包括介電性、鐵電性、半導性及檢測法。5.磁性材料特性及檢測。
description.en: The course includes: 1.Introduction of ceramics manufacturing : Including powder manufacturing , forming method, additive and sintering practice. 2.Material fundamental concept: Such as ceramic crystal structure, diffusion, defective chemistry. 3.Structural ceramic characteristics and detective method. 4.Electrical ceramic characters:including dielectricity,ferro-electricity,semi-conductivity, anddetective methods. 5.Magnetic material characteristics and detection.

description.zh: 本課程討論，利用儀器分析工作之理論，儀器之原理，構造操作及計算等。包括光譜化學，原子吸收光譜，電漿發射光譜儀，發光光譜儀，電分析化學，PH計，電解沉澱法，伏安法，極譜儀，等儀器之探討。

It includes spectrum chemistry, atomic absorption spectrograph, plasma jet spectrograph, light spectrograph, electric analytic chemistry, PH meter, electrolytic precipatation, volt ampere, polar spectrograph, etc..

description.en: The laboratory section of the mineral processing classes are designed to have student obtain hand-on experiences of various mineral processing operations. The lab. includes screening, crushing, grinding operation, settling, size analysis, heavy medium separation, classification, sluicing, electrostatic and magnetic separations, flotation, dewatering and drying.

description.zh: 地球自生成以來，其組成與結構一直在改變。今日的岩體即是這種長期改變的結果。地質學是研究岩體組成與結構變化的科學，目的在於掌握這種變化的軌跡，而構造地質學是地質學裡專門研究岩體結構變化的一分科。所謂的岩體結構（即地質構造）是指一個岩體的形狀、尺寸及其內部組成顆粒的排列情形。要了解結構的變化，無論是定性或定量，先要了解岩體的原始結構，從而才能了解現在所觀察到的岩體結構是否發生過變化。雖然構造地質學的目的是由現在既成的結構去了解地球的結構變化，但是就現在地球的結構，我們所能觀察到的岩體結構，大多被植生或土壤所覆蓋，即使偶有露出，也僅是其立體結構的某一表面而已，因此如何利用這些零星有限且是平面的岩體結構去推論地殼整體的結構，是必須首先解決的問題。面對這樣的問題，研究構造地質學應從大處著眼、小處著手，先從了解一個地區某一個露頭的現在結構開始，並由理論及實驗所得的結果推論這個岩體的結構變化過程，再由這些零星露頭的結構及其結構變化過程的資料，去推論、去拼湊涵蓋這些露頭地區的結構，由點而線、由線而面，終而包括整個地殼。
description.en: Structural geology is a branch of earth science. It has developed rapidly over the past decade. The reason for the recent advances in structural geology has been the realization that naturally deformed rocks seen in field outcrops contain a fantastic range of small-scale features which relate directly to large-scale orogenic deformation systems. The other reason has been the realization that rock deformation, like any other form of deformation, obeys well-defined physical and chemical laws. Base on this situation, this course is intended to serve as an accompaniment to techniques-based courses in structural geology or as an accompaniment to the laboratory portion of a postgraduate course. Systematic study of this advanced structural geology course includes several topics: mechanic proporties and deformation behaviors of rocks, strain analysis, ductile geologic structures, brittle geologic structures, and applied structural geology.
