Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh: 使同學具備良好的造形能力，對於今後從事各類型之設計、繪製圖表等均有幫助。教學內容包括筆法及明度練習，室內靜物寫生，室外樹木、建築物之寫生。教學方法：先練習運用鉛筆，使其表現各種筆觸、輕重，再要求造形之準確度，達到形態和質感的表現正確，以及構圖有美感的能力。先由老師示範，而後同學練習
description.en: Equip students with the ability of styling so that their designing and drawing ability can be improved. The teaching material used for this class includes stroke and chiaroscuro, drawing of still life, and nature painting outside. Teaching method: Practice how to use a pencil for the demonstrating various touches in light and heavy strokes.  Students shall learn how to perform  precise styling,  correct expression of formation and personality, and a beautiful configuration. The instructor will give a demonstration first and then students shall follow and learn.

description.zh: 本課程首先說明人在宇宙中的定位、生命的可貴、一生的方向；接著說明如何鍛鍊自己成為生命的勇士；最後強調如何與天地萬物和諧相處和真愛的永不止息。課程進行方式是透過體驗活動、交流分享和有次第的講授人類共同的智慧，並安排數次的校外教學，以深入瞭解社會脈動，並運用多媒體影片教學以提升學習效果，學生每天做身心觀察學習紀錄，更可以看到生命進步的軌跡。
description.en: This course covers topics such as: the role of human beings in the universe, the dearness of life and the pursuit of life-long goals. We then discuss ways to train the students to become brave and to harmonize human beings with the nature, leading to an access to the discovery of true love.The course is realized through activity involvement, experience sharing and lectures on human wisdom. We have some extramural visits in order to understand social pulses. Multimedia teaching materials are fully utilized to enhance the teaching and learning effects. We request that all the students take note of their mental and physical improvements on a daily basis so that they could examine the progressive path of life.

notes: 98-102年度入學(哲學核心)，103年度(含)以後入學(社哲

description.zh: 創業與財務概論課程的主要目的是要使學生了解如何在企業創立的時候，透過財務技術，來評估企業的經營績效與價值。本課程將介紹以下內容：(1) 公司創業的財務報表與科目報導與分析 (2) 基本創業財務分析理論 (3) 公司的償債能力、獲利能力、經營能力、資本結構、現金流量的分析 (4) 特殊行業的財務報表分析 (5) 探討我國最近發佈的會計準則公報對企業與投資人的影響。
description.en: The goal of the introduction to entrepreneurship and finance course is to help students, when the company is in the stage of entrepreneurship, evaluate the performance and measure the values of firms by financial statements. The topics of this course includes (1) entrepreneurship financial reports and analysis; (2) basic entrepreneurship financial statement analysis; 3) solvency, profitability, business performance, financial structure and cash flow analysis; 4) financial statement analysis of special industries 5) recent developments of GAAP.

description.zh: 首先介紹歌劇中音樂的元素、本質及角色，欣賞各時期不同類型之歌劇作品，繼由「世界三大男高音」看歌劇曲目的走向，吸引新生代同學對歌劇之響往，帶領愛樂者進入歌劇欣賞的境界。
description.en: This one-semester course is designed to let students learn:  1.to approach to their first opera with open minds and open ears 2. to understand what opera is.  3. to know the essential elements of opera－composers and librettists,  singers, conductors, directors, as well as designs and expenses,...etc.. 4.to understand the development of opera 5.to appreciate opera through watching films of various kind 6.to be able to enjoy opera for the rest of their life.

description.zh: 一、教學目標：幫助同學把毛筆字練好，進而培養欣賞能力。二、其教學內容包含1.鑑賞相關知識。2.名碑帖之認識3.篆刻、裱褙    之簡介4.行書、楷書之臨模與創作5.書論之研讀。三、評量則以整學期先後習作之比較出情訂定其成績。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to improve students' ability of appreciating Chinese calligraphy as well as the practice of handwriting skill. The contents include: 1. The knowledge of appreciation 2. Introduction of masterpieces. 3. Introductory studies of seal carving and traditional Chinese picture mounting. 4. Chinese calligraphy practice 5.reference materials study. Grading will be based on the improvement of students` works through all semester.

description.zh: 人的身體一接觸自然界，便開始各個器官的功能，人不如機器，無法汰換零件，加上身體機能遇到問題之後，許多人往往不知如何處理應對，甚至身體出現徵兆也渾然不知。所以此科目最主要的目的是希望藉由對醫學的認識，讓大學生們更瞭解自己的身體，進而保護並時時自我偵測身體是否正常運作，要培養健全的大學生，而不是只會讀書的大病貓。
description.en: Once the human body contacts the natural environment, the organs of the body begin to function.  But the human body can not change it's organizational like machine.  So when our body's function is in trouble, we always have no idea how to solve it, either to find out.  One of these course's objection is to let college students understanding their own body by learning some important medical concepts.  We hope that our country both has excellent and healthy college students,  and not all sick.

description.zh: 為建構多元化台灣社會的民主觀念，並拓展台灣政治發展的時間深度，以加強傳統與現代的有機聯繫，本課程擬從以下方向發展：政治生活與社會生活、政治文化與政治社會化、民粹主義與政治生活、公共意見與投票行為、民主憲政與人權保障、司法正義與司法革新、憲政運作與政治發展、政治秩序與政治發展、中國歷代政治得失等。
description.en: To study the time length of the political development of Taiwan and strength of the relationship between the traditional and modern period. Also the establishment of democracy in a multilateral society is to be studied. This class will study the basis of Taiwan society, and explore the following items: political and social life, political culture, socialization, populism. Also included are public opinion and voting orientation, constitution and human rights, the justice and reformation of judiciary, the operation of the constitution and political development, political order and development and an analysis of Chinese politial development.

description.zh: 一般認為台灣民間宗教信仰源於中國民間宗教傳說，此說法亦無可厚非，不過台灣民間宗教信仰極重要的特色，已不再是神教文化承接的問題，而是其已轉為在地的以實體寺廟建築場所，作為當地政治社會文化中心所發展出的民間信仰。本課程在讓同學了解台灣地區有哪些歷史悠遠的廟宇主神、事蹟傳說，以及其所帶動的宗教組織和信仰風情。課程包括：1.台灣原住民的巫術與神靈信仰、2.台灣的?時與節慶，如過年與元宵、清明與端午、七夕與普渡、中秋、冬至與尾牙等；3.台灣的主要神明信仰，如媽祖、觀音、關聖帝君、玉皇大帝、玄天上帝、清水祖師、城隍爺、地藏王、福德正神、五府千歲及王船祭等；4.台灣的主要宗教團體如齋教、一貫道、理教、天理教、軒轅教、天帝教、台灣靈乩、符籙學會、儒教學會、亥子道教等。
description.en: "Taiwanese folk religion" involves many dimensions, and it is one the most important applicable knowledge to local education. However, students in elementary and junior high schools still lack of the knowledge in this field. Therefore, the arrangement of lecture, camp, and religious construction regarding to the learning of Taiwanese folk religion is desirable. Hopefully, through all the effort, students could acquire more knowledge about Taiwanese folk religion, and share their learning experience on their daily lives. The main goal of the course is not only to improve the situation that our students have insufficient knowledge about folk religion, but also to help them apply the knowledge on the internet frequently. In addition, we will help students gain more information in this field and improve their learning quality of Taiwanese folk religion in Taiwan. This course include four fields: 1.The various gods that people believe in Taiwan 2.The Taiwanese custom and daily habits 3.The

description.zh: 本課程旨在欣賞篆竟藝術，認識我國歷代著名的篆竟家與優美的作品，由作品之中廣泛瞭解篆竟多樣化的美感表現與技法，並嘗試實現於創作。篆竟是我國特有的一種藝術形式，除了日常日信的實用功能之外，更普遍使用在書法或繪畫等藝術作品中。因此瞭解篆竟藝術之美，往往是面對其他藝術作品時所不可或缺的。篆竟創作必須在方寸微小的天地之內，專注構思，謹慎刻畫。如此苦心經營的體驗，同時也是十分可貴的精神陶冶。
description.en: This course enlightens students on the art, the arlists and the masterworks of seal cutting. Form the appreciation of great works, students sharpen the understanding of the versatile beauty and skills exerted in seal cutting.Seal cutting is a unique form of art in China. It is commonly applied in signets, and extensively connected with calligraphy and painting stampings and other artistic performance. Therefore, the understanding of seal cutting is supposed to be an inevitable way to unveil the curtain of Chinese art palace. Students are expected to work out the composition of seal cutting within centimeters;hence,their concentration and deliberation can be spontaneously molded.

description.zh: 從歷史之反省中，探索人類對未來之創造潛力。詮釋競爭與和諧，個人與國家，現實與理想之雙軌教學，期能栽培專業人力與宏觀之人材。啟發學生比較歸納、以古鑑今的思維能力，使之獲得客觀有用的歷史學識。
description.en: This course is designed to help students explore human creative potential for the future in the light of historical introspection.  This course is an interactive instruction on the following topics: competition vs. harmony, individual vs. nation, reality vs. ideality.  Emphasis will be placed on training students' logical reasoning in analysis, synthesis, comparison, induction, and deduction so that they can acquire useful historical knowledge in an objective way.  In so doing, we hope to cultivate perspective professional intellects.

description.zh: 勞動法包括與勞動市場、個別勞動關係及集體勞動關係等方面有關勞工工作權益的法律規範，透過本課程可以學習正確的勞動法律觀念和知識，同時培養縝密思辨的能力，將課堂上所習得的知識應用落實在日常生活中，來保障並維護自己或他人的職場權益。
description.en: The legal specialty called Labor Law can be define as “the legal regulation of the labor market , individual labor relations and collective employer-employee relations. “labor market” pertains to market in which employers and workers exchange labor . Through this course , students can not only get correct concepts of " Labor Law " , but learn to protect their / others' rights in work place.

description.zh: 建立設計專業用德文基礎；德文發音、拼音、基本句型、詞類文法及設計專業德文導讀，用以唸讀及理解設計專業相關德文。
description.en: Introducing the alphabet pronunciation, phonation, sentence structures and the ten parts speech grammar of German to building the capability of reading and understanding the design based German.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。1.電磁波在介質中的傳導 2.光纖光學 3.光纖種類及特性 4.發光器5.接收器 6.中繼站及光放大器 7.光纖通訊系統 8.光纖網路
description.en: 1.Electromagnetic ware propagation in media 2.Fiber optics 3.Characteristics of optic fibers 4.Optical emitter 5. Optical receiver 6.Repeater and optical amplifier 7.Optical fiber communication 8.Optical fiber network

description.zh: 地質學是自然科學的一門，是研究地球這個人類所居住的星球自生成以來，組成的物質成分與結構之變化的科學。由於地質學主要是由現在所觀察得到的自然現象去推論現在地球中岩石的組成與結構，並用逆推(Retrodiction)的推論來解釋過去發生在地球之中的各種變化。因此野外觀察為地質學研究的最基本工作。在野外觀察時所用的方法與所依據的原則與理論，即是野外地質學學習的重點。本課程之內容除複習野外地質學與地質調查的一般觀念及基本原理，包括野外地質學導論，火成岩、沉積岩與變質岩地區的地質現象與地質調查的方法外，還將進一步建立區域地質圖測製的能力，以便未來能將地質調查的能力應用於各個相關領域。
description.en: Geologic fieldwork is the basic ability for all geological studies, whether they are simply intended to describe the rocks by various field methods, or whether they form the basis of interpretive studies based upon laboratory analysis of rock samples and geochemical and geophysical data collected in the field. Such data cannot be interpreted without detailed observations of the field relationships between collected samples and of the geology of areas in which measurements were made.Professer Tucker had said that "The study of field geology is often an exciting and rewarding occupation. However, to get the most out of these rocks, it is necessary to undertake precise and accurate fieldwork. The secret of successful fieldwork is a keen eye for detail and an enquiring mind. Be observant, see everything in the outcrop, then think about the things seen and look again."This course is designed as advanced training to field observation, description and geologic mapping for graduate student

description.zh: 創業者通常無經營企業之經驗，多數創業者在擁有很好的產品時創業，同時必須要能規劃出商業經營模式、經營規模、經營團隊、行銷策略、損益兩平點、現金流量、預期投資報酬率、資金需求、可能風險等事項，才能評估創業成功機率，設定創業經營的停損點，創業者才能提高創業的成功率。對於理工科系人員，而具有優良技術能力，且有志於創業者，本課程為增強上述人才創業素養的重要課程之一。
description.en: Entrepreneurs often do not have enterprises experience. Most of entrepreneurs start their business with very good products, at the same time, they must be able to plan out the business model, business scale, management team, marketing strategy, break-even point, cash flows, expected investment rate of return, capital requirements, possible risks and other matters, in order to estimate the probability of success and set a stop-loss point. Then entrepreneurs are more possible to succeed in their enterprise. For science and engineering personnel with excellent technical ability who want to become entrepreneurs, this course is one of the important courses to enhance the abilities for enterprise.

notes: 98-102年度入學(社會)，103年度(含)以後入學(社哲)

description.zh: 本課程主要在從人生內在活動面向使學生明瞭宗教與人生的關係。首先探究人生的意義與特性，次則經由對宗教哲學，比較宗教學與宗教現象學的瞭解，來分析人生的問題。內容特別強調文化對人生的影響，宗教乃是深層文化原則所繫，同時人生問題也能引發宗教的適應與發展等等。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to approach of " Action Immanent ", enabling students to realize the relation of religions and life. First, to study the issues on the meaning and characteristics of life. Second,through the understanding of "Philosophy of Religion "、" Comparative Religion " and "Phenomenology of Religion ", to analyze the problems of life. Emphasis is on culture and the influence of life, as religion is a foundation supporting culture where problems of life can stimulate the adaptation and development of religion.

notes: 98-102年度入學(哲學)，103年度(含)以後入學(社哲)

description.zh: 介紹日常生活中所經常遭遇到的案例使學生認識法律上之常識，培養學生珍惜法律上所賦予之權利，並及時行使庶免讓權利睡著了，致蒙受意外損害。並督促學生善盡法律上之責任，蔚為人人知法，人人守法的風尚，導致社會祥和。授課內容：按民法總則、債篇、物權、親屬、繼承各篇之順序，選擇與日常生活關係最密切之案例，逐一介紹，並對解決之道詳加說明。有觸及民間權益者，例如民間互助會，使用票據之常識，海峽兩岸婚姻，汽車肇事與保險責任及軍人及其家屬優待條例等均一併介紹。
description.en: This course-through carefully examining individual cases that often happen-helps understand more about legal knowledge so that they would cherish their endowed rights and protect themselves from being hurt. This course also encourages the students to serve the duty of laws in the hope that "All People Know The Laws and All People Follow The Laws." Thecontents: Introduction to General Principles, Provisions of Obligations, Family and Succession. Cases that have much to do with the daily life are picked up for discussion. Other topics like the mutual self-help funds, the use of checks, cross-strait marriages, vehicle accidents, insurance, bonus regulations on the military servicemen and their family are also included.

description.zh: 藥膳在中醫理論指導下，將中草藥與實務相配合，運用傳統烹調技術和現代加工方法製成味、色、形俱佳的、更有保健和治療作用作之食品，其內容廣泛，迄今已有三千年之歷史。所謂藥食同源更是集中而深刻的體現了藥膳之重要性。本課程共分：湯膳概論、穀物湯膳、蔬菜湯膳、果品湯膳、畜肉湯膳、海鮮湯膳、藥草湯膳和美容養生湯膳等。
description.en: The Applied Nutrition of Life is two credit hours course and design especially for technology students. This curriculum emphasizes on the clinical applications and action mechanisms of various food cooking of Chinese drugs. The curriculum trends will start from more details and bring a completely concepts. The subjects include some Chinese food cooking contain Chinese herbal and some skill to how to select a good quality Chinese herbal.

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹世界上最新的光電科技發展及在台灣的相關光電產業。時間上規劃以第一小時介紹基本光電理論，第二小時介紹應用技術與實例。課程內容包括：1.雷射光與原理與應用， 2.雷射光與精密量測， 3.雷射光與機械人， 4.光電技術與半導體製造， 5.光資訊與光儲存， 6.光纖通訊系統， 7.紅外系統， 8.紫外線系統， 9. 雷射醫學應用， 10雷射光與國防， 11.光學設計與光學設計軟體， 12 光電科技與未來。
description.en: The course gives the outlook of the technology of Opto-electronics and the industry of Opto-electronics in Taiwan. The contents of this course are constructed as following：1. The principles and applications of Laser, 2. Laser and precise measurements, 3. Laser and robot, 4. Opto-electronics technology and semiconductor magnification, 5. Optical information and Optical storage 6. Optical fiber communication, 7. Infrared system, 8. Ultraviolet system, 9. Medical applications of laser, 10. Laser and defense 11. Optical design and software. 12. Opto-electronics and future.

description.zh: 創業與財務概論課程的主要目的是要使學生了解如何在企業創立的時候，透過財務技術，來評估企業的經營績效與價值。本課程將介紹以下內容：(1) 公司創業的財務報表與科目報導與分析 (2) 基本創業財務分析理論 (3) 公司的償債能力、獲利能力、經營能力、資本結構、現金流量的分析 (4) 特殊行業的財務報表分析 (5) 探討我國最近發佈的會計準則公報對企業與投資人的影響。
description.en: The goal of the introduction to entrepreneurship and finance course is to help students, when the company is in the stage of entrepreneurship, evaluate the performance and measure the values of firms by financial statements. The topics of this course includes (1) entrepreneurship financial reports and analysis; (2) basic entrepreneurship financial statement analysis; 3) solvency, profitability, business performance, financial structure and cash flow analysis; 4) financial statement analysis of special industries 5) recent developments of GAAP.

description.zh: 兩性關係是人際關係的核心問題，它關係著交友的態度、婚姻生活的幸福與社會的祥和。本課程由對兩性差異性的了解為基礎，以尊重為原則，在平等互助的精神中，確定兩性關係的和諧。本課程內容包括理論與實際的配合，儘量以生活化的內容貫穿其間，並注重課程內容的可實踐性，以協助學生處理兩性關係的難題。
description.en: Gender Studies is a core issue of interpersonal relationship.  It involves attitudes toward making friends, marriage and social tranquility.  This course aims to help students become aware of sex difference, understand the importance of respect, equality and mutual-help between sexes.  The contents of the course will cover both theory and practice, providing cases and examples related to our daily life so as to help students handle problems when getting along with the opposite sex.

notes: 98-102年度入學(社會)，103年度(含)以後入學(社哲)

description.zh: 本課程首先說明人在宇宙中的定位、生命的可貴、一生的方向；接著說明如何鍛鍊自己成為生命的勇士；最後強調如何與天地萬物和諧相處和真愛的永不止息。課程進行方式是透過體驗活動、交流分享和有次第的講授人類共同的智慧，並安排數次的校外教學，以深入瞭解社會脈動，並運用多媒體影片教學以提升學習效果，學生每天做身心觀察學習紀錄，更可以看到生命進步的軌跡。
description.en: This course covers topics such as: the role of human beings in the universe, the dearness of life and the pursuit of life-long goals. We then discuss ways to train the students to become brave and to harmonize human beings with the nature, leading to an access to the discovery of true love.The course is realized through activity involvement, experience sharing and lectures on human wisdom. We have some extramural visits in order to understand social pulses. Multimedia teaching materials are fully utilized to enhance the teaching and learning effects. We request that all the students take note of their mental and physical improvements on a daily basis so that they could examine the progressive path of life.

notes: 98-102年度入學(哲學核心)，103年度(含)以後入學(社哲

description.zh: 植物與人類生活息息相關，人類選擇植物加以栽培生產，用來提供食、衣、行、及健康所需，而農耕的發達則與人類文化及社會的演變互相影響。本課程將由各種不同角度介紹，包括植物特性、栽培管理技術、自然環境、地理、人文、社會、政治、經濟等方面，與植物生產的關係。主旨希望同學能了解人類與植物間相依相存的關係，並進一步關懷人類、植物、與自然環境之間的相處之道。
description.en: Plants supply major food for all kinds of living organisms.  This lecture is prepared to introduce the relationship between the crop plant and modern food  production.  The whole spectrum will be viewed from the aspect of the chacteristics of platns, the nature environment, science, human civilization, society, politics and economics, etc..  Hope students can concern and respect the mutuality between plants and human.

name.en: The Development of Taiwan Technology History

description.zh: 台灣科技發展史將討論二十世紀前半（1900-1950）部份重要技術引入台灣後，造成的影響與社會變遷。依時間先後，先從農業技術的變革-綠色革命。其次研讀有關電力與水利的技術發展，然後進入工業化初期的台灣社會變遷，以及二次大戰期間軍需工業所引導出的初期重化工業。除了這些技術與產業變革之外，也將兼論及技術人物群像與職業教育的開端。
description.en: The main topics for class will discuss the important technology how to influence Taiwan society during 1900-1950. This class includes some important developments: Green revolution -it discuss about agriculture development; the technology development of electricity and water conservancy. In some topic we discuss about Taiwan society change in early days industrialization and chemical industry during world war II. Except those topics, technologists and the beginning of professional education in Taiwan will be introduced.

description.zh: 面對科技發展日新月異，社會急驟變遷的新世紀，只習得專業上的一技之長，已不足以和協圓滿地實踐有意義的人生。有鑑於此，乃以生涯發展與生涯諮商的理論與研究為基礎，配合學生的發展，希翼能透過教育的歷程，使學生的專業知識能和未來的工作與生活規劃，產生有意義的聯結，進而為學生提供一個短程與長程的生涯發展與選擇的準備與指引。授課內容包括生涯理念介紹、興趣、性格、價值觀探索，生涯決定因素，生涯技巧，生涯角色調適，生涯選擇與規劃技巧，生涯訪談，生涯高原調適，轉型期調適，性別、職業歧視，雙生涯家庭，就業準備等主要生涯課題的研討與習作。
description.en: In face of a new century with continuous scientific development and rapid social changes, to learn one single professional skill is not enough to fulfill a meaningful life in a harmonic and satisfactory manner. In view of this, based on the theory and research of career development and consultation in association with the development of students,  it is hoped to produce a meaningful linking between their professional knowledge and job and life planning through the course of eucation, and further to provide them a preparation and guide for short and long-range career development and choice. The contents of the course include the discussion and exercise related to major career topics such as introduction to the concept of career, the discussion of interest, character and value, decisive factors of career, skills of career, role adjustment in career, career choice and planning skill, career interview, uphill adjustment in career, adjustment in transit period, sex and occupation.

notes: 98-102年度入學(社會)，103年度(含)以後入學(社哲)

description.zh: 面對日益複雜的社會現象與社會組織，生活規範已由傳統的道德習俗，逐漸代之以法律倫理，生活在現代化的社會，有必要從認知法理、遵守法律，進而要求落實法治。俾政府施政依法而治，社會倫理得以重建，個人權益亦獲得確實的保障。本課程兼顧理論與實例的探討，包括法律的理念與概念、法律與社會生活各層面的關聯性、現行法體制的基本認識、法治生活的檢視與展望。
description.en: Facing increasingly complicated social phenomena and organization, norms of life are governed by laws instead of traditional moral customs. Living in modern society, it is necessary to have a better understanding of the law, so that people will abide by the law and further thoroughly implement the legal system to ensure that the government administration may be performed in accordance with the law. In this way, social ethic may be re-established and individual's benefit may be protected. The discussion in the course covers theory and examples, including the concept of the law, law and politic, law and society, law and life, etc.

description.zh: 個人或國家都無法自外於當今的國際社會；政治、經濟、社會、文化各層面皆受到國際間互動的影響下，為增進知識青年具備國際化的視野與認知，以因應時代發展趨勢，在強化技術研究的基礎上，拓展國家、社會與個人的發展空間。本課程內容包括基本理論與國際關係的動態，涵蓋國際社會的結構與演變、國際行為的類型及支配此行為的各種力量、國際事務的現象、本質及因果關係。
description.en: An individual or a country may not keep alien to today's internatonal community. Owing to internationally interactive influence with respect to politic, economy, society and culture, the purpose of the course is to equip intellectual youths with internaitonalized sight and awareness to keep pace with the develolpment trend of times, and to expand the space for national, social and individual development on basic of reinforced technical research. The contents of the course include basic theory and the situation  of international relations, covering the structure and changes in the international community, the type of international behavior, and various forces dominating such behavior, the phenomenon, essence, cause and consequence of international affairs.

description.zh: 本課程有系統概括性闡述動態地球科學的基本知識和理論。課程內容包括:地球簡介、地球在天體間的位置、地貌、全球熱量平衡、氣溫、水氣、降雨、風、氣旋、氣候、天氣、生態系統、水文、土壤、地球材料、岩石圈、板塊構造運動、火山、風化作用、塊體運動、淡水、流水地形、地形與岩石構造、風與浪地形、冰川地形、冰川期、土壤與生物等。
description.en: The contents of the course titled " INTRODUCTION TO EARTH SCIENCE " include : the earth; our place in the sun, geomorphology, the earth's global energy balance, air temperature, atmospheric moisture and precipitation, winds and global circulation, weather systems, global climates, global ecosystems, hydrology, global soils, earth materials, the lithosphere and plate tectonics, volcanic and tectonic landforms; weathering and mass erosion, fresh water of the continents; landforms made by running water, landforms and rock structure; landforms made by waves and wind; glacial landforms and the ice age; soil and biology.

description.zh: 本課程的重點在於闡述管理學之基本概念，主要的內容涵蓋四個領域：(1)瞭解管理學之理論與相關學者之研究報告；(2)討論企業界管理應用實務案例；(3)探討多國化管理之趨勢與差異(4)如何落實管理理論研討與趨勢。另外介紹現代管理相關功能實務應用案例。
description.en: The purpose of Management has four distinct objectives：(1)to introduce a new management paradigm；(2)to effectively combine the basic concepts of management and organizational behavior into a single volume, including the management functional and departmental descriptions；(3)to discuss business management applications in practice and ；(4)to effectively implement the management basic ideas. The planning, organization, decision, leadership and monitoring among variety culture will be covered and discussed in the class as well.

notes: 98-102年度入學(社會核心)，103年度(含)以後入學(社哲

description.zh: 這e世紀時代的資訊交流是一個廣泛、多樣化與複雜的；究竟人們如何透過溝通表達意識與行為，卻變成非常重要。有效的溝通程度常視為學習溝通的指標，須視事實、竟見、感覺、嗜好和經驗進行徹底地交融與分享的結果。因此，本課程重視現代社會學習「溝通管理」的二項關鍵技術包括：有效溝通結合自我學習技巧和方法：商業知識與科技結合促成人的系統互動能力，配合多媒體傳輸工具完成學習個人與團體溝通效益。課程涵概主題:1.溝通管理定義與本質元素。2.溝通管理內涵分析。3.學習個人溝通能力。4.學習溝通程序。5.e化自我學習技巧、方法與表達能力。6.學習全球化溝通科技工具。7.團隊溝通的策略與協同戰術。8.塑造整體溝通文化。
description.en: The information exchange is wide, variety, and complicated in the e-era; how do people express their consciousness and behavior turn to become very important. Effective communication degrees usually are seen as the index of learning communication. It depends on thoroughly melting and sharing with fact, opinion, feeling, interesting and experience. Therefore, "Communication Management," in this course we emphasize on two key techniques of modern society learning including: effective communication with self-learning skill and method; Business knowledge and technology with interactive ability of human system. By using multimedia transmitting tools to complete self and group learning communication and get benefit.Course Subjects:1. Definition and essential element of Communication Management.2. Content analysis of Communication Management.3. Learn personal communication ability.4. Learn communication process.5. E-learning skill, method, and expression ability.6. Learn the technical tools

notes: 98-102年度入學(社會)，103年度(含)以後入學(社哲)

description.zh: 倫理學(Ethics)是討論「應不應該」的一門哲學分支。倫理學可分為「微觀倫理學」：探討個人性之行為的應不應該的問題，以及「宏觀的倫理學」：探討整個社會的政治、經濟、法律、社會等方面的問題。倫理學亦可區分為「規範倫理學」及「應用倫理學」兩大類，前者探討善的定義與判斷準則、動機論與結果論、人的意志是否自由、決定論與責任、自律與他律、幸福與快樂、哪些德行(virtue)值得追求等等課題，後者則是運用倫理學觀點探討諸如安樂死、墮胎、環保、複製人等種種課題。本課程主要目的是在對倫理學課題與種類作一個基本的介紹，訓練及培養學生在倫理問題上思考的能力，期能讓學生在作道德問題的判斷與抉擇上能夠有所進步。
description.en: This course will introduce basic ideas of Ethics to students. The topics will include: the definition and criterion of good, motivation and consequence, the problem of free will, determinism and responsibility, autonomy and discipline by others, happiness and pleasure, and virtues. This course will also touch upon those issues in applied Ethics, such as abortion, environment, business ethics, death sentence, etc.

notes: 98-102年度入學(哲學核心)，103年度(含)以後入學(社哲

description.zh: 個人或國家都無法自外於當今的國際社會；政治、經濟、社會、文化各層面皆受到國際間互動的影響下，為增進知識青年具備國際化的視野與認知，以因應時代發展趨勢，在強化技術研究的基礎上，拓展國家、社會與個人的發展空間。本課程內容包括基本理論與國際關係的動態，涵蓋國際社會的結構與演變、國際行為的類型及支配此行為的各種力量、國際事務的現象、本質及因果關係。
description.en: An individual or a country may not keep alien to today's internatonal community. Owing to internationally interactive influence with respect to politic, economy, society and culture, the purpose of the course is to equip intellectual youths with internaitonalized sight and awareness to keep pace with the develolpment trend of times, and to expand the space for national, social and individual development on basic of reinforced technical research. The contents of the course include basic theory and the situation  of international relations, covering the structure and changes in the international community, the type of international behavior, and various forces dominating such behavior, the phenomenon, essence, cause and consequence of international affairs.

description.zh: 婚姻是一般人所必經的過程，家庭是生活的場所，關係著人生的幸福與美滿。本課程強調美滿婚姻與幸福家庭是一門學問，因此，課程內容包括：對婚姻與家庭有正確的認知、積極的態度、完整的規劃，並培養有認真努力去實踐的方法與能力。如何追求真正的快樂與幸福？除了在婚姻與家庭中追求平等化、合理化、自由化、公平化外，自我成長、相互尊重都是本課程的學習目標，以協助學生思考婚姻與家庭的終生大事。
description.en: Marriage is a process that most people will go through.  Family is where you belong to, and where the satisfaction and happiness come from. We believe that it is a kind of scholarship to have a high-quality marriage and a wonderful family.  The contents of this course include having the correct understanding of marriage and family, cultivating positive attitude, developing complete plans, and realizing them with all efforts. This course will help students think totally about marriage and family, learn to pursue equality, reasonableness and liberty, keep growing and respect each other, so that we can obtain the real delight and happiness.

notes: 98-102年度入學(社會)，103年度(含)以後入學(社哲)

description.zh: 唸社會哲學的主要原因在於，在社會的架構之內，從哲學的角度去探索一系列很根本的問題。它們包括﹕正義、公平、人權、自由、公民意識、市場與道德、科技與道德的關係等等。我們的探索是以哲學知識做為基礎，例如: 功利主義、康德的道德哲學、羅爾斯的正義理論，還有內格爾、多爾肯、與沈對公平理念的討論等等。由於這些問題與我們的福祉休戚相關，身為一個受過良好教育的社會公民，我們便需要具有社會哲學的知識。準此，我們可以了解社會是如何運作的，並且能夠對一些和我們個人利益乃至公共福祉相關的社會性議題進行反省，從而對它們做出正確的抉擇。
description.en: The main reason for studying Social Philosophy is that within the context of society, a number of fundamental questions can be answered from a philosophical perspective.  These include:  justice, equality, human rights, freedom, citizen consciousness, market and morality, and the relationship between technology and morality, etc. Furthermore, our investigation is based upon philosophical knowledge such as Utilitarianism, Kantian moral philosophy, John Rawls’ theory of justice, the debate of the idea of equality among Thomas Nagel, Ronald Dworkin, and Amartya Sen, etc.  Given these issues are directly relevant to our well-being and benefits, to be informed social citizens, we need to have knowledge of this subject.  Thus, we can know how the human society works, and being able to reflect upon these social issues that concern our personal interests and public welfare in an attempt of making good decisions for them.

notes: 98-102年度入學(哲學)，103年度(含)以後入學(社哲)

description.zh: 此課程提供理解媒體報導全球暖化相關議題必要的基本知識，主要內容包括以下重點：一、氣候變化與全球暖化現況概述二、地球溫室效應與主要溫室氣體簡介三、氣候的人為暖化與自然變異四、有關全球暖化熱門議題探討
description.en: This is an introductory course to Global Warming. The purpose of the course is aimed to give some basic knowledge to college students for understanding those Global-Warming related issues that have been frequently covered by popular news media.The contents of the course include:1.Climate change and the recent warming trend of the earth.2.Green house effects and green house gases.3.Attribution of recent climate change.4.Discussion on popular issues of global warming.

description.zh: 本課程教導學生了解新創事業在智慧財產權與專利管理的基本知識，課程的教導將朝下列方向進行: (1) 新創事業智慧財產權的基本觀念與實務， (2) 專利資訊分析，(3) 專利演化與發展 ，(4) 創意產出，(5) 專利申請與保護 (6) 專利佈局 (7) 專利侵權鑑定 (8) 專利迴避設計 (9) 案例討論與分析。
description.en: This course teaches students Intellectual Property Rights and patent management for Entrepreneurship. The course includes topics as follows: (1) Basic knowledge and practices of Entrepreneurship Intellectual Property Rights; (2) The analysis of patent information; (3) The evolution and development for patent; (4) Innovative idea generation; (5) Application and protection of patent (6) Patent strategy (7) Patent violation，(8) Patent avoidance，(9) Cases study.

name.zh: 創業之品牌管理與行銷
name.en: The Brand Management and Marketing of Entrepreneurship

description.zh: 創業者在新創事業時，同時須考慮新創事業之品牌建構，如果能在創業之初建構一個定位明確的品牌，可使新創事業立即享有良好的品牌權益，提高創業成功的機會。品牌建構完成後，須設計行銷方案，對消費者進行行銷活動，向消費者推銷新創公司之品牌，以塑造良好的品牌權益。此時，消費者對新創公司之品牌會有良好形象之認知，進而提升顧客對新創公司品牌忠誠度，增加創業者創業成功之機會。
description.en: When entrepreneurs are building a startup company, they also need to consider its brand building. If they can construct a clear positioning of the brand in the beginning, they are able to have their new business with a better brand equity immediately, and improve entrepreneurial chances of success.After the completion of construction of the brand, entrepreneurs need to design marketing programs for consumer marketing activities, and promote its brand to create good brand equity. In the meantime, consumers will have a better brand awareness of these new companies, enhancing customer loyalty and increasing opportunities for entrepreneurs’ entrepreneurial success.

description.zh: 本課程講授媒體、企業與政治三者之間競合的互動關係，教你看透媒體新聞背後的意識形態、商業利益與政治操作。深入瞭解由傳統紙媒到當代電子媒體、網路媒體、各種新媒體通路中，大數據與內容的製作該如何結合運用。新聞媒體在企業與政治體系中的特殊角色與效應也是探討焦點。課程中將會針對海峽兩岸新聞媒體與綜藝節目製作做對比分析。    本課程結合理論與實務導向的專題，以培養學生對當代傳播媒體現象與體制深入分析探究的能力;更引導學生具體認識在數位新媒體的時代中，如何利用新媒體來進行廣告、行銷、公關等實務操作的策略及步驟。
description.en: This course focuses on the interactive relationship between media, business, and politics, thereby helping students understand the political ideology, business interests, and political manipulation behind news and media events. The course also presents an in-depth analysis of the combination of big data and media content, in the complex production network of paper media, electronic media, internet media, and various other new media. The role and effects of news media in contemporary business and political establishments will also be explored. The course brings in a comparative and critical analysis of news and entertainment programming in both Taiwan and mainland China. This course combines theoretical framework and professional practice in order to cultivate the ability to intelligently analyze and explore the dynamics of various media phenomena and media institutions. The students will also be expected to learn the basic concepts of practical strategies and operating skills of new

description.zh: 以攝影來進行社會介入的創作作品，在當代藝術的領域中已經不再陌生，而這樣的發展也促成在社會學領域中越來越多關於攝影與社會的討論。本課程主要分為兩大部分，第一部分將從攝影史發展脈絡，來談攝影的社會使用，第二部分則是探討在當代藝術中，如何將攝影作為一種社會實踐的方式。除課堂講解和集體討論外，本課程也將透過實作討論同學的攝影計畫和作品，期使讓同學對於攝影，可以產生新的社會性思考，並開始進行影像與社會介入的嘗試。
description.en: In the field of contemporary art, photography has been developing into a way of social intervention. This trend also contributes to triggering more dialogues concerning “photography and society” in the discipline of sociology. The course mainly includes two parts: photography history and the photography as a social practice. In the first section, along with the history of photography, the social usages of photography will be introduced. In the second section, how photography art can be a social practice and what kinds of practice have been explored will be . In addition to class lectures and group discussions, the course requires all students to complete their individual photo project in the end of semester and their works will be presented in class.

name.en: from Constellations to Study Evolution of Stars

description.zh: 本課程主要從星座來學習恆星一生的演化過程。先從認識古代星空觀察方法以及星座的由來，並透過星座盤的演練辨認由恆星組成的四季星空．接下來從恆星的演化特質，探索星座中恆星的演化以及其未來命運。最後從學習太陽系的恆星「太陽」 分析恆星對人類的重要性以及影響。
description.en: This program is concentrated on studying evolution of stars from Constellations. From ancient astronomical methods and origin of constellations, the students will use Star Locator to identify stars in night sky and study general properties of the stars. Through the classes, students will learn important properties of the “Sun”, the star in our solar system and analyze how the astronomical phenomena effect life of human beings.

description.zh: 以攝影來進行社會介入的創作作品，在當代藝術的領域中已經不再陌生，而這樣的發展也促成在社會學領域中越來越多關於攝影與社會的討論。本課程主要分為兩大部分，第一部分將從攝影史發展脈絡，來談攝影的社會使用，第二部分則是探討在當代藝術中，如何將攝影作為一種社會實踐的方式。除課堂講解和集體討論外，本課程也將透過實作討論同學的攝影計畫和作品，期使讓同學對於攝影，可以產生新的社會性思考，並開始進行影像與社會介入的嘗試。
description.en: In the field of contemporary art, photography has been developing into a way of social intervention. This trend also contributes to triggering more dialogues concerning “photography and society” in the discipline of sociology. The course mainly includes two parts: photography history and the photography as a social practice. In the first section, along with the history of photography, the social usages of photography will be introduced. In the second section, how photography art can be a social practice and what kinds of practice have been explored will be . In addition to class lectures and group discussions, the course requires all students to complete their individual photo project in the end of semester and their works will be presented in class.

description.zh: 以國內外設計競賽為主軸，輔導與協助學生積極的參與國內外設計競賽，訓練學生獨立思考與問題解決能力。
description.en: This course aims to focus on domestic and international design competitions, guide and help students ' active, and let students have independent thinking and problem-solving skills.

name.zh: 設計研究與創作專題(一)
name.en: The Research and Practice on Design Issues (I)

description.zh: 針對特定設計議題，學生學習應用研究與設計理論，並透過適當研究與設計方法探討其潛在的問題與有效的解決方法。議題主要針對：產品、空間、資訊、機構識別等設計行銷與服務設計、評量與管理等項目之研究與創作。課程研習結果可望作為研究生進階研究或設計創作之重要基礎。
description.en: Focusing on specific design issues, the subject directs students to apply proper theories and methods in research and design in order to explore critical problems and to provide effective solutions. Specific issues in relation to marketing and service management regarding the design of product, space, information and corporate identity are to be researched and be practiced. The result of study forms the foundation of further research or design development for research students.

name.en: Introduction to Furniture and Interior Design

description.zh: 以創意的實作訓練為主﹐藉由家具與室內設計空間之相關性的主題, 透過實際設計程序的演練以培養設計的能力。
description.en: Through the operation of furniture and interior design, freshmen will practice details of the design process, materials, and manufacturing process.

description.zh: 本課程為設計理論的講授，其內容包含溝通基本觀念、感知心理、記號理論、情報理論、傳達理論等之理論架構及應用模式。
description.en: The study of design methodology, including the theory structure and application module of the basic communication knowledge, conception psychology, symbolization theory, information theory and communication theory.

description.zh: 21世紀的工業設計師已不能再靜待市場研究及產品企劃人員提供產品設計規範，而應以使用者代言人、及企業產品開發整合者身分，主動參與產品策略與企劃，並以視覺化技術協助相關人員作橫向溝通。因此，「產品創新設計策略與企劃」課程主要目標在教導學生以「前瞻性的視野」，透過創新設計的步驟與方法，策劃出符合企業技術及經營體質，並且能滿足市場及使用者使用情況需求的產品。本課程將以理論、方法、案例研討及個案研究方式進行。
description.en: The function of industrial design in the 21st century, will no longer waiting for the product definition from the marketing and product planning, It will become a integrator and visualizer during the product innovation strategic phase, and concerning to the user's needs. Product Innovation Strategy will guide the enterprise looking beyond their current operation to match their technologies and the distinct competencies with emerging the user and the market needs. The contents of this topic will include theory, methodology, and practical case study.

notes: 工設大四、碩士班、碩專班與最後一哩合開

name.en: Special Topics in Molecular Cell Biology

description.zh: 本課程討論細胞培養與基因工程技術之原理與應用，課程內容包涵下列主題：(1) 微生物、植物、昆蟲及動物細胞之特性 (2)細胞於生物反應器的培養，包括各式生物反應器介紹、生物反應器動力學、生物反應器之操作與控制 (3)基因重組蛋白之表現，將包涵不同的細胞載体表現系統 (4)實例探討，如單株抗體、生物高分子材料、基因治療載体等之生產。
description.en: This course discusses the principle and applications of cell culture and molecular biology.  The course covers the following topics: (1) characteristics of microbial, plant, insect, and mammalian cells; (2) cell culture in bioreactors, including descriptions of bioreactor types, operation modes, bioreactor kinetics, and instrumentation and control; (3) expression of foreign genes in various cell systems; (4) case studies, such as production of monoclonal antibody, biopolymers, and gene therapy vectors.

description.zh: (1)輻射度學與光度學基本參數介紹-流明、燭光、勒克斯、尼特 (2)光的量測-總光功率量測、光強角分布、光譜量測、色溫量測、演色性量測 (3)配光曲線與照明簡單範例計算 (4)室內照明標準與照明規畫 (5)道路照明與CIE道路照明標準 (6) Dialux照明專用軟體介紹 (7) Dialux室內照明設計實例 (8) Dialux道路照明設計實例(9) Dialux體育場照明設計實例(10) Dialux景觀照明設計實例。

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹資料探勘與大數據分析的理論方法與應用，課程內容涵蓋資料探勘的基本概念，如資料準備、資料探勘的方法與實證、資料探勘的進一步運用，並加入商業等各領域的實務案例介紹，具體說明如何應用資料探勘與大數據分析技術以解決真實問題。另外在工具方面則透過相關分析軟體操作與實作範例輔以說明，讓學生學習資料的準備、工具的應用及分析判斷，透過實作課程，使學生能容易應用資料探勘方法，進而提升大數據分析和數位決策能力。
description.en: This course explores the rapidly developing fields of big data for the efficiency of decision making in various fields. The topics are about basic concepts of data manipulations, analytic, and communications which are including: introduction to big data; basic knowledge of data mining; special topics of big data in business Analytics, and data analytic project.The course will help students careful consideration of what is desired from big data, how big data analytic to add value to business, etc.Students can gain a strong data science knowledge set and techniques via in-depth case studies, most current readings and experiences, and most current and future technology exploration.

description.zh: 介紹多媒體各項基礎技術，包括文字、圖像、影像、動畫與音訊，以及各項技術的整合應用。
description.en: This course introduces the elements of multimedia design, including text, graphics, video, animation, and audio, as well as the applications of the integration of those elements.

description.zh: 本課程以提升學生英文能力，至全民英檢中級以上的程度為目標。教學內容以加強學生日常生活中，如：購物、旅遊、定餐等用語之溝通、運用、表達及閱讀寫作等能力為主。
description.en: The goal of this course is to help students enhance their English proficiency superior to the Intermediate Level of General English Proficiency Test. A student who completes this course will be able to perform routine daily communication such as travel, shopping, ordering a meal, etc. and will have better understanding in reading and writing.

notes: 限碩士班學生修習(碩士班畢業門檻)

description.zh: 先修課程：3002014或負責教授同意。燃料及燃燒、基本熱傳理論、蒸汽動力廠、壓縮機、燃氣輪機、內燃機、汽油引擎、柴油引擎、冷凍空調循環。
description.en: Fuels and Combustion, Principles of Heat Transfer, Steam Power Plants Compressors, Gas Turbines, Internal Combustion Engines: Gasoline Engines, Diesel Engines, Refrigeration And Air Conditioning.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有深度文化視覺的科技人。從認識本土文化為起點，進而認識世界文化。引導學生如何探究文化現象，並且深入文化的精神境界，物質境界，瞭解文化價值與文化傳統，讓文化觀點充分融入個人的思維內涵。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to develop the cultural cultivation of our technology majored students. Starting with the culture of our own land and extending to world-wide culture. The teachers would guide the students to explore the phenomena of the culture, and try to find out both the spirit and the material of the culture. Through the understanding of the worth and the tradition of the culture, the students might merge the cultural cultivation into their personal thinking.

notes: 文化向度,限外籍生修讀

description.zh: 新創事業面臨許多的挑戰，包括：避孼與大企業競爭，找到存活的依據、從無到創立強勢品牌、創立或擴張自有市場/消費者據點等。本課程旨在啟發修課同學創業的興趣並協助修課同學思考新創事業如何平衡有限資源以迎向挑戰。新創企業已發展成熟的企業是不一樣，主要是因為新創事業的資源有限，創業家必須同時兼顧許多面向並回應顧客所需。本課程旨在協助修課同學思考創建企業應注意的各種面向評估自己的創能力。課程包含了三大部份，第一部份為創新與創業概念啟發；第二部份在辨別市場機會與發展市場；最後第三部份為新創事業行銷管理。行銷活動能夠將企業的產品及服務傳遞給顧客；並將產品、服務及企業本身的資訊帶到市場上；將顧客資訊回饋給企業。創業行銷管理能夠幫助創業者向潛在投資者及企業夥伴銷售創意以獲得資源，也讓創業家透過創新的商業手法來充分利用稀少的資源。
description.en: Managers must have excellent leadership skills in order to A start-up company has lots of challenges, such as: niche market located and brand diffusion. The course intends to encourage the participant to become an entrepreneur and handle with these challenges. A start-up company is different from well-developed one due to limited resources. Usually, to response customer’s requirement, the entrepreneur must take multiple criteria into consideration simultaneously.    The course includes three parts. Part I build students’ concept about innovation and entrepreneurship. Part II is about market identification. Part III is about marketing management of a start-up company. The efficient marketing activities enable business to approach customer’s requirement, to bring their customer product (or services) and get customer’s feedback. Also, the marketing management helps entrepreneur to reach their potential investor to obtain more resources.

name.zh: 投資決策方法與交易技巧

description.zh: 本堂課邀請大富資訊各領域投資達人，從總經訊息剖析、產業趨勢分析、財務及商業分析投資選股、期權衍生性商品投資策略及套利避險實戰技巧，為台北科技大學學生分享其業界多年的寶貴心得。財富自由是每個人所企求的，如何於在學期間培養好的投資理財觀念及交易技巧，一方面可降低未來步入職涯後財富大幅縮水的風險，另一方面或許可成為步入職場的利器，甚至可能是邁向財富自由的另一助力。
description.en: This class is going to invite investment experts from FORTEK COMPUTER CO  to teach the students by sharing their practical experience in the finance industry. The contents include macroeconomic information analysis, industry trend analysis, financial statements analysis, investment strategies of futures and warrants, as well as experience sharing of trading techniques. Everybody wants to achieve financial independence; therefore it is important to have the right concept of investments and trading techniques. The purpose of this course is, on the one hand, help students reduce the risk of financial loss due to lack of financial knowledge. On the other hand, for those students who are interested in financial industry, this course offers practical training and may help students to find good financial-related jobs in the future. Also, it may help students to achieve the goal of financial independence.

notes: 四管三、碩士班與最後一哩合開

description.zh: 解析國內國家考試「會計學」之命題趨勢。並以實際國家考試考古題為案例，在解題過程中引導學生建立完整的會計理論體系，增進學生對會計理論的理解與應用能力，培養學生的邏輯思考、並增進解題技巧，順利通過國家考試。
description.en: Resolve domestic national examination "Accounting" Trend proposition. And the actual state exam archaeological entitled case in the problem solving process to guide students to build a complete system of accounting theory, enhance students' understanding of accounting theory and application capabilities, develop logical thinking of students, and enhance problem-solving skills, passed the national exam.

notes: 四管三、碩士班與最後一哩合開

name.zh: 國際觀培養:泰國文化與語言(一)
name.en: Development of global perspective: Thai culture and language I

description.zh: 1. 在臺灣與東南亞交流日益增加的情況下，東南亞語言的學習需求也會隨之提高。而「泰國」所擁有的社會經濟條件優勢，以及泰國政府有意推動的文化創意產業，相信也將為臺灣帶來一陣「泰語學習風潮」。 2. 課程以培養基礎泰語溝通能力、激發學習泰語興趣，以及跨文化理解為宗旨。課程架構包括泰國語言教學及元化議題討論，使其在具備泰語溝通基本實力之外，更能對泰國各方面情勢與文化、思想、禮節、風俗習慣、宗教禁忌等，都具有深度認識。 3. 泰語教學方面，秉持聽、說、讀、寫同時並進的教學理念，由字母的發音、寫法、唸法、聲調、順序及拼字系統的學習開始，奠定良好的泰語基礎，搭配最常用的單字、句型、文法與日常實用會話，使學生可以拼寫、閱讀泰文短文，並能以泰語進行日常對話。 4. 泰國文化方面，以專題的方式，講述政治、經濟、社會、地理、歷史與文化等各個層面的泰國，呈現出不同於一般刻板印象中的泰國，培養學生對泰國的正確認識及態度。本學期先針對泰國目前的經濟與文化面進行概說；下學期則探討泰國歷史、地理、政治與社會。
description.en: 1. With the interaction between Taiwan and Southeast Asia getting more and more frequent, the need for learning Southeast Asian languages has been highly increasing. Thailand owns the advantages of social economy; moreover, Thailand government intends to promote cultural creativity industries. Hence, learning Thai definitely becomes a new trend in Taiwan. 2. This course aims to help students build the foundation of speaking basic Thai, and arouse students’ interests in learning Thai. Also, it helps students get to know cross-cultural differences. In addition to learning Thai, students have to discuss the issues related to Thai culture. Accordingly, students are not only able to make conversations, but have further understanding of Thai culture, thinking, manners, customs and religious taboos etc. 3. description.zh: 使學生了解台灣廚具產業概況，廣泛邀請廚具業師講述廚具產業相關商品研發、設計、製造、銷售、服務等知識，並進行實務參訪，以作為進入廚具產業職場之就業準備。
description.en: This course introduces students the state of art of the kitchen industries in Taiwan.  In order to prepare students to work in kitchen industries, experts are invited to address issues about the design, manufacturing, sale and service of kitchen appliances.  Some field trips are also arranged.

notes: 四設四與最後一哩合開

name.zh: 創業講座-網路創業達人秘笈
name.en: The Secrets to Successful Internet Startups

description.zh: 隨著網際網路的發展，電子商務的產值快速成長，網路創業大行其道，成為許多創業者的新選擇，面對這波網路創業風潮，應如何在茫茫網海中嶄露頭角？網路上沒有絕對正確的答案，最好的學習方式就是彼此分享成功經驗。這次講座特別邀請國內知名的網路創業達人，分享他們的創業故事。走吧，跟著這次講座來趟冒險吧！
description.en: Along with the prosperous development of Internet, the output value of E-commerce is growing fast. Launching a business on the internet has become a new choice for many entrepreneurs. How do you create a successful internet business endeavor? There is no specific success formula; the best way is to learn from the experts in this field. This course will invite well-known internet entrepreneurs to share their success stories with the students and allow students to gain insights to various internet business models.

notes: 上課時間:星期三ABC(共6週),經管系所與最後一哩合開

description.zh: 本課程旨在講授土木文化資產基本知識，培育工程與文化資產兼備之人才，以發揚文化資產之價值，提升我國文化層次及文明水準。透過授課、參訪及研究以培育文化資產之技術從業及學術研究人才，以加強文化資產之發掘、維護、保存及活化等作業內涵，促進其相關之學術、技術及技藝活動，以發揮文化資產相對價值，進而提升我國文明水準。
description.en: The course aims to develop an awareness of the diversity of issues related to civil engineering cultural assets and to nurture engineers with both engineering and cultural backgrounds so as to enhance the levels of cultural and civilization of our society. Through visits and lectures, students will be able to learn the historical development of civil engineering; the maintenance, preservation and revitalization of surviving historical civil engineering assets; and to appreciate and foster cultural assets.

description.zh: 本校為強化學生的就業能力，加強學生的職場競爭力，開設「職涯進擊講座」之課程，藉由業界主管與人員分享面試技巧、溝通表達、職場自我行銷、生涯規劃及介紹不同種類的工作模式，如派遣、公職、舒活族、獵人頭公司、國外企業等，提升學生對於國內外職場的認識，並進一步提升學生的就業率與競爭力。

The course contents include tips of interview, self-marketing in the workplace and the planning of the career life etc. By the topics, students will be equipped with a variety of presentation skills that needed in the workplace to raise the employment rate.

description.zh: 「互聯網」（Internet）發明至今，已徹底改變人們的生活及行為模式，進入21世紀，整合了雲端計算、大數據、物聯網及移動互聯網等技術，並藉由「互聯網」與其他產業的有機結合，進化為「互聯網+」，德國目前積極推動的工業4.0就是「互聯網+工業」的概念，規劃透過本課程邀請國內「互聯網+」產業業師親臨分享，帶來產業新知給予學生一場醍醐灌頂的科技新知饗宴，進而激發學生的創新創業思維。
description.en: Internet has a dramatic impact on human life and behavior model. By combining cloud computing, big data, internet of things and mobile computing, through integration with existing industries and business, internet + has emerged as a dominating application. This course intends to invite experienced enterprise experts to present talks to the students, aimed to give students creative ideas and inspire students for innovation and entrepreneurship thoughts and actions.

name.en: French Culture and Paper Art Application

description.zh: 為了讓技職教育回歸「務實致用」的根本，導入產業能量，強化產學合作與實務教學，提高實作與實驗課程，加強基礎學科能力與人文素養。「紙質文化與應用課群」以「紙質文化」為主軸，分支三項課程核心理念，整合產業資源與專業師資，共同規劃課程內容，培育紙質專才。    本課程的核心理念為「紙藝應用」，以奠定技職學生創新思維為要點，從法國文化為始，探討法國紙藝的藝術思維，並以具體案例看其設計詮釋。爾後與展覽設計師共同授課，結合文化元素作創意設計，從空間尺度探討紙材特性的展現。再導入與業界共同規劃之教材，讓學生從材質出發，研究與研發紙品的可能性，最終以達務實致用之目標。
description.en: France has magnetized global design talents with its exemplary avant-garde ideas, one of them being paper arts and crafts. This interdisciplinary course aims to incorporate different elements — designers, scholars, students, and Puli’s (埔里) paper industry — to enrich learners’ cultural literacy and R&D skills, further motivating student designers and Taiwan’s paper industry to advance their creativity. By inquiring into the French cultural heritage, students are expected to not only cultivate diversified global views, but, specifically, learn how French designers transform existing cultural elements into cutting-edge ideas as regards paper arts and crafts.

description.zh: 本課程係以提高學生新聞英文閱聽能力為主， 使得學生能廣泛熟悉各類新聞媒介的文章專論. 學生將建立各領域的常用/專用字彙, 了解分析寫作風格與技巧, 並增強聽力能力.  透過日日變化更新的世界時事, 學習英文將是切身相關, 生動活潑的經驗.  除了英語能力提升或知識增長豐富之外, 更可以奠定未來繼續獨立學習的基礎. 教學材料來源取材自China Post, Time, Newsweek, CNN, 民視英語新聞等新聞媒體。
description.en: The aim of this course is to guide students into the world of modern English in a wide range of writing styles and subject matters.  It intends to build up confidence and competence of students who are interested in reading a variety of topics in the newspapers and magazines as well as other media. The first focus is to enrich vocabulary tank by learning key words in realms like business, economic, politics, entertainment, art; the second is to help master the writing skills and styles in journalism; the last is to enhance listening ability via broadcasting materials on audio/video channels like ICRT and CNN.

description.zh: 本課主旨在培養學生職場英語文溝通能力，如提案、企劃案提寫、時事討論、公司產品行銷、書信寫作，希冀能夠藉由本課程之修習，加強學生進入職場前的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to provide students with a firm foundation in business communication skills. Students will learn how to present a proposal, start a discussion, and promote company products in English. It is hoped that by the end of this course, students are equipped with sufficient knowledge of general and business English.

description.zh: 本課程的目的在於培養學生書寫各式專業書信書寫 (如簡歷、提案、會議紀錄等) 的能力，並提供各種共同合作的機會，訓練學生在未來工作上所需之團隊配合能力。搭配本課程充分的練習，學生將能夠準確且有效地運用所學之專業書信形式來達成職場上的溝通需求。
description.en: This course aims to develop students' skills in performing selected types of professional written discourse (e.g., resumes, proposals, meeting minutes). Various opportunities for students to collaborate with their classmates will also be provided as they will often be required to do so in an actual workplace. With sufficient practice, students will finish this class with the ability to communicate clearly and effectively in written forms.

name.en: Course in English language Proficiency Tests

description.zh: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize the students with various kinds of language proficiency tests such as GEPT, TOEFL, TOEIC and many others to the same end. It is our hope that the students who finish taking the course will go on with their enthusiasm on studying foreign languages; besides, through the acquisition of the certificate when the students pass the tests, they are sure to enhance their capability in the increasingly competitive job markets.

description.zh: 現代通訊與訊號處理系統仰賴電路、硬體與軟體之間的協同運作，因此通訊工程師應具備必要的軟體設計的能力。本課程以建立此項核心能力為目標，並以C++為語言主要教學語言。學生須於課後投入約150~200小時完成一個通訊軟體設計專題。    本課程涵蓋下列主題：1	通訊軟體特性2	程序式程式設計3	物件式程式設計4	物件導向式程式設計5	泛型式程式設計：使用C++ 標準模板函式庫(STL)6	單元測試7	通訊軟體函式庫8	通訊軟體設計個案研9	通訊軟體設計專題
description.en: Modern communication and signal processing systems rely on the close collaboration of circuits, hardware, and software. Therefore, software design is one of the core capabilities that communication system engineers should possess. This course aims to establish this core capability using C/C++ as the working language. The student is expected to complete a term project that involves 150 to 200 hours of work off class.     The following topics are covered: 1	Characteristics of Communication Software2	Procedure-oriented programming3	Object-based programming4	Object-oriented programming5	Generic programming using C++ Standard Template Library (STL)6	Unit testing7	Communication libraries8	Case studies in communication software design9	Term project in communication software design

notes: 二選一；資工所與電資外生專班合開

Optical signals are transferred into electronic signals for analysis. It involves :               ．Introduction            ．Optical Heterodyne Interfeometer        ．Geometrical Error       ．Optical Encoder         ．Geometrical  Methods   ．Laser Encoder        ．Interferometers

description.en: This course is intended to help students explore various issues concerning intellectual property protection for industrial designs. The topics cover design patents, trademark, copyright, indigenous cultural expressions, and design service contracts. Students are required to read articles and cases prior to each class. Participation is necessary. The grading is based on the final term paper, in-class presentation, and participation.

name.en: Advanced Study on Indoor Air Quality

description.zh: 本課程介紹室內空氣品質及室內空氣污染對人體之危害、室內空氣品質檢測方法、污染源診斷、空調與通風換氣、空氣品質控制及改善、國內外法規、管理計劃規劃。室內空氣污染物之移除技術、室內空氣清淨機原理應用於室內空氣品質之控制。
description.en: Advanced Study on indoor air quality control, management and regulation. Indoor air pollutants and their sources, fresh air and indoor air conditioning & ventilation, indoor air cleaner design.

name.zh: VR與AR於工作環境設計概論
name.en: ntroduction of VR/AR in workspace and its design

description.zh: 此概論課程將介紹虛擬實境及擴增實境相關技術於工作環境及其設計之應用。課程中將介紹虛擬實境及擴增實境於不同工作環境及其設計之應用實例，旨在使學生了解如何將虛擬實境及擴增實境之技術運用在實際工作環境、產品及系統設計。
description.en: The introductory course gives an overview about VR (virtual reality) and AR (augmented) technology applied in different workspace and its designs. Various applications and examples of VR and AR applied in workspace design will be demonstrated. The goal of the course is to empower students in learning VR/AR applications and how to apply the techniques in actual work environments, product development and system designs..

name.zh: 國際觀培養:西班牙語與文化(一)

description.zh: 本課程專為初學西班牙文之學生設計，毋需任何西班牙文基礎。本課程著重在學習西班牙文發音及了解基礎文法架構。課程結束前，學生將可以閱讀基本的西班牙文文句、自我介紹及西班牙文的基礎對話。
description.en: This is course is designed for first time students of Spanish. No previous knowledge is required to enroll this course. The focus of this course is to provide a basic knowledge of the pronunciation and grammatical structures of Spanish at the beginner level. By the end of this course, the student will be able to read basic texts in Spanish, self-introduce himself and start a basic conversation.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:日語與文化(一)

description.zh: 本課程提供學生養成基本日語聽說讀寫技能，並能夠面對在各種情境下，表達出適當的日語，足以應付日常生活簡單狀況。此外，並運用多媒體等工具，介紹日本文化，歷史，人文等多種面向，讓學生能更多元地了解日本，有效提升學習興趣及效率。
description.en: This course provides a comprehensive approach to developing the four basic language skills (listening, speaking, reading, and writing) in order to cultivate your overall Japanese language ability to a level sufficient for various occasions and everyday life.In addition , using multimedia to introduce a variety of Japanese culture, history , and humanities. The students can learn more about Japan in many different perspectives, and effectively enhance interest in the learning process.

description.en: This course covers the following Topics.1.Theory of air cleaning Mechanism.2.Clean room configuration, construction and         verification.3.Air filtration theory.4.Paper discussion.

description.zh: 台灣傳統建築史的研究已歷多年發展，累積了相當豐富的研究成果。本課程擬由傳統閩客建築類型所屬之空間文化進行研討，透過"環境與構造"、"儀式與空間"、"政治與建築"等進階專題研討，期待引領修課同學進入並體驗台灣傳統建築的深層特色與意涵，過程中除了相關文獻的閱讀，案例調查報告外，並由田野實地參觀，帶領同學感受台灣傳統閩客建築的獨特環境與空間文化。
description.en: The research of the history of Taiwanese traditional architecture has got a great achievement after many years of development. This course is focus on the spatial culture of different types of traditional Hakka and Fujian architecture. I hopes that every students could understand and experience the deep social cultural meanings and features through the study of following three issues :"environment and construction", "rite and space" and "politics and architecture".  This course would not only be proceeded by the reading of related documents and the reporting of different case, it also combined the field visiting and investment to lead students to enjoy the very special cultural heritage.

description.zh: 本課程主要針對永續建築設計創意進行探討。宇宙萬物瞬息變化，在全球既有之永續建築觀念中，研究者如何在不違背這些觀念的前提下，整合各種不同觀念並提出符合其專業道德之創意思維，以確實滿足符合目前及未來國際潮流對於永續理念的看法；研究者在學習過程中會發現：永續建築設計創意對應永續議題時，那將不只是理論而已，它更必需是融合建築專業實務、技術、道德等因素之結晶。永續建築設計創意不容被挑戰，卻也經常被挑戰；然而，永續建築設計創意如何能夠經得起不同的挑戰與看法，這關乎研究者對於永續建築與設計創意之理解程度；因此，研究者除必需提供相關資訊說明其創意與永續之關係外，更必需提出其創意如何與永續應對，以使所提之創意理念不是空談。換言之，本課程期望透過討論與辯證，進而傳授研究者學習如何整合問題並提出新的思維，而此思維將會符合未來實務所需，以使研究者在學時已具備未來進入職場解決問題之能力。

description.zh: 教學目標為幫助學生瞭解衍生性金融市場的運作，如何利用，及其定價模式。內容包括選擇權市場機制的介紹、股票選擇權的特性及其交易策略、Black-Sholes模型、及風險值的討論等。
description.en: The goal is to help students understand how the derivatives markets work, how they can be used, and what determines the price. The course includes the following topics: the options market and its mechanics, properties of the stock options, the trading strategies, the Black-Sholes Model, and the Value at Risk.

name.en: First step to achieving the goals of universities and Engineering Ethics

description.zh: 大學入門是針對大一新生所開授之全校性課程。用以協助學生:(一)認識高等教育的理念、目的與價值(二)有效學習(三)涵養正視困境並妥適因應能力。藉以實踐自我鍛鍊，自我掌握，自我經營並建構宏觀視界的高等教育宗旨。依據提供服務準則,工程師們須以誠實公平公正正當和奉獻保護公共健康,安全及幸福。工程師們必須以專業標準的行為履行最高的倫理準則。本課程以（1）工程倫理概述（2）衝突與抉擇（3）守則與解說（4）個案分析，提供學生瞭解及研析。
description.en: "First step to achieving the goals of universities" is a campus-wide course provided for all of the first-year students at this school. The course is designed to help first-year students to achieve the following aims and objectives:(1) understanding the basic idea, goals, and fundamental value of higher education at college level;(2) learning proper study attitudes and methods effectively;(3) cultivating the required abilities and skills of responding appropriately to setbacks and difficult situations in order to acquire self-knowledge, self-control, and self-management, so that they may construct the knowledge and imagination that are needed in planning for grand visions of achieving the goals of higher education. Accordingly, the services provided by engineers require honesty, impartiality, fairness, and equity and must be dedicated to protection of the public health, safety and welfare. Engineers must perform under a standard of professional behavior that require adherence to the hi

description.zh: 「時間學」是一門相當實際的課程，其目的在教導學瞭解時間的意義，提升時間使用的價值以善用時間，充實自己的生命與生活。本課程內容提供時間理論相關的觀念與方法，希望同學於課程中，一方面從學中做，一方面從做中學，而達到「時間學」增進個人健康，促進人際關係，有效處理公私事宜的三大功能。
description.en: "Time Science" is a very practical course and its purpose is to teach students the meaning of time with a view to increasing the value of time utility so as to make good use of time and enrich one's own life and living.The contents of the course provide the concept and method relating to time ethic and hope students to learn and work so  that "Time Sciecne" may attain three major functions--increase personal physical and mental health, promote interpersonal relationship and effectively handle public/private affairs.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:印度文化與語言
name.en: Development of global perspective: Hindi culture and language

description.zh: 至印度與東協有了初步經濟上的合作以來，雙方的經濟即迅速地成長，更於2009年成功地簽訂了自由貿易區，印度的影響力在東協的成長上不容小覷。本課程將以印度語(Hindi)教學為主，並推廣印度當地的文化及特色，期待帶領學生更深入的了解印度，並協助學生拓展東南亞的事業版圖。
description.en: The partnership between India and the Association of South East Asian Nations (ASEAN) has been started decades ago, which evokes a quick economic growth in between. India has been playing an important role in the development of the ASEAN after they signed a bilateral contract of the ASEAN-India Free Trade Area in 2009. The connection between India and the ASEAN has therefore become greater and closer. This course aims to introduce the fundamentals of Hindi and provides with opportunities to experience culture differences.

description.en: Through the paper describes the characteristics of the type of paper and do change due to systematic theoretical introduction, the Western paper repair techniques combined with case studies, practical fieldwork visits to understand the current status of the paper conservators.

description.zh: 年來，在世博和花博兩大活動的帶動下，讓跨領域整合的「展示科技」成為新的研究焦點；新型態的展示手法，可以被應用在博物館及展場、商業空間、互動式機台、行銷活動和數位藝術。依照需求的不同，可以把展示科技分成『會場環境』和『觀眾體驗』兩類，前者就像是基礎建設、活動系統和周邊系統，而後者則是為觀眾創造全新體驗。而本課程則是為了掌握產業界相關的技術新知、學術界的專業研究與藝文界的脈動，本課程將廣邀展示科技的專家或學者，參與專題討論，就展場設計、互動技術、視覺呈現等面向，翻轉你與展示物的關係，體現創意展現的軟實力。
description.en: The promotion of Expo and Flora Expo in recent years makes the display technology a new focus in study. New pattern of display techniques can be applied to museum, exhibition, commercial space, interactive machinery, marketing and digital art. Depending on different needs, the Display Technology can be divided into two categories, which are "the environment of exhibition" and "the experience of audience". The former is like fundamental constructions, movable system, and peripheral system; the latter is like building a new and fresh experience for the audience. To understand science and technological information from business field, researches from academic field and issues from arts field, this course should be invited the expertise and scholars to participate the topic discussion.

description.zh: 模具工程不只要讓初學者熟悉模具的設計，而且要讓有經驗的模具設計者也能夠以工程的方法來設計模具。此外模具工程也提供塑膠工業相關的從業人員瞭解模具知識，如銷售員與售後服務人員。課程內容分為四大部分：(1)基礎─包含模具、射出機、塑膠材料、產品等。(2)模具設計的一般方針─模具佈置、澆口、流道、排氣、頂出、模具冷卻等。(3)模具的規格：模具零件與材料、模具加工、強度與疲勞。(4) 模具性能：模具壽命、成形週期、成形品之肉厚、尺寸、形狀等。 (5)特殊成形法：共射、埋入件、氣輔、覆蓋、微射出、金屬射出、陶瓷射出等。
description.en: Mold Engineering is to familiarize not only beginners in mold design but also more experienced mold designers with an engineering approach to mold design. In addition, mold engineering is also recommended mold knowledge to any individuals, such as sales and service personnel, in the plastic industry who need to understand mold in their activities. This course is divided into four sections: (1) Basics about Mold, Injection Machine, Plastics, and Products. (2) General Mold Design Guideline: mold layout, gate, runner, venting, ejection, mold cooling. (3) Specification of the Mold: mold parts and material, mold machining, strength and fatigue. (4) Mold Performance: mold life, cycle time, wall thickness, product size and shape. (5) Special Injection Molding: Coinjection molding, Insert molding, Gas-assistant injection molding, over molding, micro injection molding, Metal injection molding, Ceramic injection molding.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。曲軸沖床、各單元件之設計與構造要點、剪斷原理與過程、變形原理、成形現象、引伸原理、力的分析、設計實例、連續引伸的設計程序。

description.zh: 為培養土木工程系大學部學生瞭解設計圖中內容，本課程採用實務的教學方式，以工程師實際面對的建築設計圖、結構設計圖、土木設計圖及機電設計圖等，加以解說圖面內容並引導學生理解設計涵義及實作演練。並結合工程知識、營建工程實務操作及專案管理領域整合的能力，使學生畢業後與業界無縫接軌。本課程主要內容如下:1.熟悉一個工程或建案中必備之完整圖面內容2.熟悉設計圖上各種符號、線條之用處及表示的意義3.結構標準圖、配筋圖與施工規範之解說4.如何依設計圖進行工程品質之查驗5.其他與勞工安全相關知識等
description.en: To improve undergraduate civil engineering students to understand the design drawings reading ability.  This course provides a set of design drawings, such as building, structural, civil and MEP design drawings, for instructors to explain the meaning of the design drawing, and guide the students to read the related drawings. The course also includes practical exercise for students to read the drawings, and to understand the information in the drawings. The course will also involves the knowledge of engineering to enhance the integration ability of all the design drawings for the students. The contents of this  course are listed as below:1.To familiar with the whole set design drawings.2.To familiar with the meaning of symbols, lines and expression in the design drawings.3.To understand general notes, general drawings, reinforcement and specification in structural design drawings.4.How to inspect the construction quality by the design drawings.5.Other topics about labor-safety

description.zh: 跨文化溝通, 認知記號, 產品語意, 生活環境相關課題, 以科技整合, 人因互動, 研究方法為重點, 以跨領域整合, 國際合作, 模擬驗證為特色之設計。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved intercultural communication and design project with research and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory and practice in research and development dealing with the design project is reviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution to the field of design base on supportive research. The study of related topics on Cognitive Semiotics and Product Semantics. The course will be characterized by inter-disciplinary and international cooperation and simulation verification.

description.zh: 本課程是研究所程度的計算機圖學，介紹三維計算機繪圖原理、OpenGL、著色語言、繪圖管線、計算幾何、射線追蹤、體積成像繪圖，課程範圍包含計算機圖學最新的研究主題如物理模擬、射線投射、巨觀且聚焦技術、即時體積成像繪圖等等。
description.en: This course is a graduate-level computer graphics class. Topics include 3D computer graphics, OpenGL, shading language, graphics pipeline, computational geometry, ray tracing, and volume rendering. The course material cover topics of the state-of-the-art research problems, such as the physical simulation, ray casting, focus and context techniques for volume data for real-time rendering.

name.zh: 紙質修復與預防性維護實作
name.en: Unhistorical repair program teaching material - paper repair and preventive maintenance implementati

description.zh: 透過介紹紙張的特性與種類，並將紙質變因做系統的理論介紹，將中西方的紙質修復技法結合案例分析，走訪田野調查實際了解目前紙質文物修復現況。
description.en: Through the paper describes the characteristics of the type of paper and do change due to systematic theoretical introduction, the Western paper repair techniques combined with case studies, practical fieldwork visits to understand the current status of the paper conservators.

description.zh: 本課程主要目標在研習以VLSI的觀點來設計近代數位訊號處理架構，使學生得以將數位訊號處理的架構以超大型積體電路IC方式來實現之。其課程內容包含如下：1、超大型積體電路介紹2、各式數位訊號架構介紹3、各式加減乘除法器架構4、DCT、FIR、MPEG等架構5、近代高效率數位訊號等架構6、專題研究
description.en: This course is an introduction to the design and implementation of various types of VLSI DSP structures and such that the students have the ability of DSP IC design in this course. The major topics covered in this course are:1、Introduction to modern VLSI system2、Introduction to digital signal processing system3、Architectures of adder、subtracter、multiplier、divider etc.4、Architectures of DCT、FIR and MPEG etc.5、Modern high-performance DSP architecture6、Special project

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 教師王瑜君,醫大8101教室,博雅選修文化

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 教師林子晴,北大三峽校區商學院1F01,博雅選修文化

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：History

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Philosophy

description.zh: 哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth.  The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us.  These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death.  Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions.  The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions,   also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions.  Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.

notes: 教師林佳靜,醫大2202教室,博雅選修社哲/哲

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 教師日宏煜,醫大語文教室2,博雅選修文化

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：History

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

notes: 教師查忻,北大三峽校區人文學院2F08,博雅選修歷史

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Philosophy

description.zh: 哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth.  The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us.  These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death.  Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions.  The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions,   also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions.  Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.

notes: 教師王冠生,北大三峽公共事務學院1F03,選修社哲/哲
