name.en: Special Topics on Clean Power System

description.zh: 介紹各種潔淨且高效率的先進車輛動力系統的型式及其工作原理並分析技巧。項目包含車輛能源所面臨的一些問題及可能的解決方案、優良動力源的特性、電動系統、複合電動系統、複合氣動系統、氫燃料電池動力系統、金屬燃料電池動力系統、各種替代性燃料的特性及優缺點、太陽光電輔助動力系統等。
description.en: This course introduces various kinds of clean and high-efficiency vehicular power systems, their operation principles, and analytical skills. Topics include: problems and possible solutions the vehicular power system faces, characteristics of a good vehicular power system, electric power system, hybrid electric power system, hybrid pneumatic power system, fuel cell power system, metallic fuel-cell power system, substitutive fuels, and solar-energy auxiliary power system.

notes: 大四與碩士班、碩專班合開

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 教師陳淑惠,北大三峽校區法學院2F02,博雅選修文化

description.zh: 此門課程主要在於瞭解社會學的意涵，並藉由跨領域的學習，讓不同學科能有對話的空間。課程涵蓋的範圍會兼顧理論與實用性，讓學生能思考當今的社會，理解到產生因素的多元性，並進而使個人眼界能更加開拓。期望學生於課程學習中能夠擁有更多對於整個社會的不同思維，以強化本身學科之所需，不但具有理論性深入的洞察力，也能引用到管理上實質的層面。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to understand sociology. It covers theory and practicability, and make students consider the current society, and understand the generated factors of diversity . Expect students' study can have more for the community as a whole different way of thinking, in order to strengthen their academic needs, not only has the theoretical depth of insight, but also on the substance applied to the management level.

notes: 社會向度，限外籍生修習 (新聘：黃淑怡)

name.zh: 國際觀培養:印度文化與語言
name.en: Development of global perspective: Hindi culture and language

description.zh: 至印度與東協有了初步經濟上的合作以來，雙方的經濟即迅速地成長，更於2009年成功地簽訂了自由貿易區，印度的影響力在東協的成長上不容小覷。本課程將以印度語(Hindi)教學為主，並推廣印度當地的文化及特色，期待帶領學生更深入的了解印度，並協助學生拓展東南亞的事業版圖。
description.en: The partnership between India and the Association of South East Asian Nations (ASEAN) has been started decades ago, which evokes a quick economic growth in between. India has been playing an important role in the development of the ASEAN after they signed a bilateral contract of the ASEAN-India Free Trade Area in 2009. The connection between India and the ASEAN has therefore become greater and closer. This course aims to introduce the fundamentals of Hindi and provides with opportunities to experience culture differences.

notes: 限45人,英語授課(印度籍及母語為印度語者不得選)

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。品質管制之基本觀念、應用統計與機率來推定及控制產品品質、管制圖、抽樣原理、品質成本、品管系統設計及系統績效之評估。
description.en: Fundamental Concepts of Quality Control, Use Statistics and Probability to Infer and Control Products Quality, Control Chart Principle of Sampling Quality Cost Q.C System Design and Performance Estimate.

description.zh: 本課程包括：光的傳播、光的向量特性、光的同調性與干涉、多光束的干涉、光的繞射、晶體光學、熱輻射與光子、光譜、光跡光學。
description.en: This course includes the propagation of light, the vectorial nature of light, coherence and interference, multiple-beam interference, diffraction, optics of solids, thermal radiation and light quanta, optical spectra, and ray optics.

name.zh: 智慧工作流程管理系統

description.zh: 傳統工作流程的記錄是以紙本形式呈現，但因書寫方式不同，導致管理者檢視時耗時又耗力且錯誤率高，為了提升管理效率，本課程藉由Low-code app工具的方式來教導同學學習製作自己設計的工作流程追蹤系統，以便取代紙本紀錄的繁複程序，而且可以即時追蹤進度並立即修正錯誤，以提高工作品質。利用AgilePoint NX的完整教學來完成簡易式實驗室的管理流程系統，此系統為初學者最容易上手的軟體工具，操作流程簡易不需要撰寫複雜的程式碼，用模組的方式很快速的來建立工作的流程管理系統。
description.en: The tradition workflow records, were paper written without standard format, causing advisors the time-consuming and labor-intensive efforts when viewing them because of the high error rate of the records. Therefore, using the Low-code app to design an Intelligent Workflow Management System to replace the complicated lab procedures recorded in paper can instantly track progress and immediately correct the errors to improve the quality. It can be done through AgilePoint NX to design a simple workflow management system. This system is an easy software tool to use for beginners because of its simple operating procedures and no need of writing complex Codes.  Instead, the pre-designed modules can be applied for the rapid build-up of the workflow systems.

notes: 四分四與碩士班合開(黃雲紹)

description.zh: 內容包含感測器應用於生物科技、奈米技術與癌症醫學本課程介紹感測器做為量測生物體系及相關之工具以及奈米技術與癌症醫學。第一章為生物傳感器概述，包含生物傳感器分類和檢測以及應用；第二章為DNA傳感器應用及挑戰，包括生物工程簡介及生物之基本電學與化學之特性與功能。
description.en: Section 1: Overview of Biosensors: Current and future approaches to Environmental Monitoring & Point-of-Care Diagnostics.．Introduction to biosensors, ．Classification of biosensors, ．Real-time and label-free sensing, ．Portable biosensors, ．Applications in food and waterborne pathogen detection, ．Applications in healthcare monitoring and diagnostics, ．Applications in Current biosensor marketsSection 2: DNA sensors: Fundamental factors and challenges Fundamentals of Bioengineering ．Brief reviews in Instrumentation Engineering．Introduction in Electrical and Electronic Science & Systems．Why DNA sensors, ．Requirements for DNA sensing, ．Principle of DNA Sensors, ．Types, ．Applications and challenges

description.zh: 內容包含感測器應用於生物科技、奈米技術與癌症醫學本課程介紹感測器做為量測生物體系及相關之工具以及奈米技術與癌症醫學。第一章為生物傳感器概述，包含生物傳感器分類和檢測以及應用；第二章為DNA傳感器應用及挑戰，包括生物工程簡介及生物之基本電學與化學之特性與功能。
description.en: Section 1: Overview of Biosensors: Current and future approaches to Environmental Monitoring & Point-of-Care Diagnostics.．Introduction to biosensors, ．Classification of biosensors, ．Real-time and label-free sensing, ．Portable biosensors, ．Applications in food and waterborne pathogen detection, ．Applications in healthcare monitoring and diagnostics, ．Applications in Current biosensor marketsSection 2: DNA sensors: Fundamental factors and challenges Fundamentals of Bioengineering ．Brief reviews in Instrumentation Engineering．Introduction in Electrical and Electronic Science & Systems．Why DNA sensors, ．Requirements for DNA sensing, ．Principle of DNA Sensors, ．Types, ．Applications and challenges

description.zh: 本課程將簡介醫學基礎與臨床知識，並對目前臨床使用之生醫材料作廣泛的介紹，與現今生物科技相結合，激發學生對於基礎研究及臨床科學的創意與思考。涵蓋科別將以牙科、骨科及整型外科為主。
description.en: This course will introduce basic medical and clinical knowledge. Those biomaterials that have been clinically applied will be focused. The aim is to inspire students' innovation and thinking about clinical science, through combining concepts of biotechnology with biomedical knowledge. Dentistry and orthopedics will be the major departments summarized.
